I pushed the "Help" button, and in 5 seconds there was a gal on my screen asking, "How can I help you".  I told her my problem.  She did some kind of hokey poky inside my Kindle, then asked me to try to sign in.  Bingo..it works just fine.  What a great feature, what a great device!  Faster downloading apps and internet pages than my Galaxy S3.  Enjoy yours.
Reviews.Title: As Advertized

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am just crazy about my Kindle Fire HDX.  I also signed up for Kindle Prime and I watched my first free movie last night.  I am so glad I asked for the Kindle.  I also added the Yahoo App for weather and have set up a few cities and check them everyday.  Of course, I have downloaded quite a few books already.  I just can't express in enough words how much I enjoy my Kindle HDX.  I ran into a small problem in regards to searching for movies and I called Amazon and Mary Ann walked me through it in 5 minutes.  Great customer service from a very nice lady.
Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift of Kindle

Reviews.Author: Victoria Mendez
Reviews.Content: I have become a hardcore Kindle freak.... and now I have two...one 7inch hdx and one 8.9inch hdx....Love em both....I'm a nurse so the 7inch hdx I use for work and the 8.9 hdx is for having fun at home. I'm a reader and a movie buff so the so called "closed" system of Kindle isn't an issue for me. Any google app I have on my android I have either successfully  found on kindle's system or found a satisfactory or BETTER replacement for it....seriously the best tablet anywhere for those who don't require a windows os. The screen resoulution is AMAZING....I'm a prime member too so I have TONS of free movies to watch....the speed is lightening fast and no freezing issues as some have experienced. I love AMAZON....who ever owns this company...."WAY TO GO!!!! I HOPE YOU BECOME A BILLIONAIRE BECAUSE YOUR SERVICES, PRODUCTS AND COMMITMENT TO EXELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE ACTUALLY MAKE PEOPLE'S LIVES BETTER" XXOO ;-)
Reviews.Title: MY HUSBAND IS JEALOUS OF MY KINDLE LOVE AFFAIR....LOL!!!

Reviews.Author: Bob Linda
Reviews.Content: Would be a 5 star, but the Wi-Fi disconnects too much, my wife's IPad stays connected much better, and its only a gen3
Reviews.Title: almost perfect

Reviews.Author: M.Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I own 3 Kindles,The original Paper White, Kindle Fire HD, and now The New Kindle Fire HDX8.9. Although I love them all,the latest is perfect for me! The 1st. One was only for reading,out in my porch,at the pool in the summer. When I saw the Fire in color,and it was pretty much like a laptop I bought it and loved everything about it. It did have a glare,but that was fixed with a screen saver. I have a lot of health problems,and my Kindle keeps me company and reading is my pass time,but one of my disabilities is my eyesight is getting really bad. The New Fire HDX, 8.9, has a nice sized screen, no glare, more clear, and a lot thinner and lighter. I don't have any bad things to say about either of them but this one is perfect! Thank you to the makers, and Thank you to Amazon for the super fast 2 day Prime Shipping. If anyone has thought about buying a kindle this is the one to get.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fast enough, has gorgeous color and he picture, is incredibly light, and even for a low tech writer, fairly easy to operate once you fool around with it for a few days.Mayday is excellent for when you really get confused. Great idea. I am sure everyone will soon copy it!Don't miss the Google play store since I buy those apps on my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone.
Reviews.Title: Look out Apple!

Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I was already the proud owner of the Kindle Fire HD 7" and decided to get the 8.9' Kindle Fire HDX in addition, for the larger screen and two way camera.  I found the sound to be a bit distorted and low in volume, compared to HD 7". Then I compared it to the Kindle Fire HDX 7" (my sister-in-law) and it was the same result, both 7" were clear and loud compared to the muddled sound of the 8.9".  I proceeded to return twice and I found all three Kindle Fire HDX 8.9' I tried were all comparable in sound.  I gathered that the 8.9" is calibrated at a lower volume, all three were not audible until one quarter up the volume scale.  I am hopping this was done for engineering reasons like vibration or something than an evil plot to get you to buy speakers, which I did.  If anyone knows the real story please share it with me.
Reviews.Title: Love it except for the Sound

Reviews.Author: Nanhenker
Reviews.Content: I did not have or need a tablet, but I wanted a quick and clean way to mirror photos and video to the big screen, and I have been a long-time user of Verizon mobile hotspot connectivity because I'm never at home.  I was instantly impressed with the color display as well as the very decent audio.  I consider myself a serious amateur photographer, and I have  to say that I am using my Kindle for quick clear macro shots instead of my cameras; but of course this is only a tablet camera. The connectivity is flawless, and the download speeds are like lightning with the double processors. I have used this device to control my GoPro camera remotely; nice!  (Although the free app had to be sideloaded.)  I do wish the built in Silk web browser had Flash compatibility, and the that the Google Play store was not blocked.  There are other sites that you can get apps from, and I understand why Amazon wants to protect itself as well as our devices, but the Amazon app store is severely limited.  There are simple effective workarounds for most major complaints here, and I have used the Amazon experimental video streaming player, however on some sites (read: subscription) where it will  not work when the content is routed off the site's servers to Amazon's servers. I'm working on how to fix this.  I have used every major feature except the Miracast, which I will try when I get an adapter for the TV, but so far, the device is lovely and fast!
Reviews.Title: Bought for Photography / Miracast

Reviews.Author: Zettie
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet.  I wanted to upgrade from my older Kindle Fire and this is great.  It is lightweight and easy to read.  I am enjoying all of the great features of this tablet.
Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet

Reviews.Author: Azlina Abdul Aziz
Reviews.Content: I sold off my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 to buy the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and I am so glad I did. The new Kindle Fire HDX is so light and with the specifications of a Quad Core 2.2 Ghz Snapdragon and 2 GB RAM, it is so buttery smooth. The display is fantastic. I am so happy I made this purchase. I just wish I could download google play though and that would hit the sweet spot. Nevertheless, I would highly recommend this tablet to people interested in media consumption.
Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!

Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi 4G LTE works as promised. I love everything about this Kindle. it is handy for watching Netflix, reading, using the internet, and playing games. I wish they left the micro HDMI slot, which is the only negative I have. the mayday button is amazing. I regret that I did not get to thank the young lady that helped me. I would recommend an Amazon Prime account. Amazon Prime has a lot of free movie and TV shows to watch, and it is handy if you like to rent movies, plus the discounts you get and free delivery on a lot of items in the store.
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi 4G LTE

Reviews.Author: Barbara L. Suesz
Reviews.Content: Our computer is set up downstairs.  When my husband had back surgery recently, the kindle fire was so nice for him to use from his chair upstairs.  It did have a learning curve and had some frustration over buying a book to tell you how to operate.  Our other kindles came with an owners manuel installed and that would have been nice.
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: SAD
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle, they have done a great job on it! I like to read at night before going to sleep the lighted screen is just perfect my husband can sleep while I read, I don't have to have the light on. Screen can be changed to paper so it is not to bright so can still go to sleep. Color is perfect!!! The only thing I have trouble with is it it a sluggish changing the page on pentrest, but would not trade it. Oh, I gave my older one to my sister in law and she loves it!!
Reviews.Title: Love it!!

Reviews.Author: ogre1164
Reviews.Content: Does everything they say it does and does it well. Compares very favorably with my wife's iPad. Very happy. Only disappointment is the fact that you can only get apps from Amazon. No Google apps. No Google Play. I understand you can jailbreak (or root) the device but it apparently voids the warranty. Come on Amazon don't you get enough of my money without nickel and diming me on a poor selection of apps? I also hate the "special offers"
Reviews.Title: Very happy but...

Reviews.Author: loreli
Reviews.Content: OMG, the best Christmas present ever!  I gave it to my husband  for Christmas, he hasn't put it down. HDX 8.9 speed, display, ease of operation, gaming is awesome, the camera rivals anything, viewing tv or movies is amazing, gotta love that mayday button.  Problem?  My Kindle Fire is so slow in comparison now!  So, the moment my husband goes to sleep or work, down goes my Kindle Fire, and I grab his 8.9 HDX WI-FI! Can't afford to get a second HDX right now, but luckily he doesn't mind sharing. Well, sometimes,  way to go Amazon! Did I mention amazing service?
Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!

Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: I've had android devices ever since the tmobile G1 was released (I had a pre-order).  I have never had a device like this before though.  It is smooth- I have not experienced the lag or other distractions that remind you that you are on an android device.  This is likely due to the tweaks amazon have made to the android OS (to make it into Fire OS) as well as the blazing quad-core processor.  The speakers in this device add to the gaming experience and the processor drives games to awesome visual depth.  An office suite is also included.I didn't buy this device for gaming.  It was the specs vs. price which attracted me.  A 2.2ghZ quad-core processor is the fastest I could find in an android device and the Amazon integration is great but not overly distracting.  I have no regrets about my purchase at all.
Reviews.Title: Absolutely slick!

Reviews.Author: Gram
Reviews.Content: I'm finding more things I love about the HDX each day. I think the best upgrade is the camera..Although I have used the May Day feature a couple of times. This service is GREAT! The reps are so helpful and congenial. I purchased a Samsung smart t.v. and next thing I know the kindle was asking me if I wanted to watch Netflix on the kindle hdx or the Samsung t.v.. I'm not tecky so all these new features are wonderful!!  Best tablet for the best price! I rarely ever use my computer anymore. No reason to - I can do everything right from here!
Reviews.Title: nice upgrade from hd

Reviews.Author: Debra Schultheis
Reviews.Content: I've been an Apple fan for a long time but because of the high prices, I thought I would give this a try.  I'm glad I did.  It has everything my Ipad 4th gen has and it actually seems a little faster.  It was easy to set up and get into.  Although, I am still learning, I enjoy all it has to offer and recommend it to anyone.  Very impressive.The only bad thing I found out was that no one in my area carries any of the cases for the 8.9" display model so Amazon you're there for me again.  Thanks Amazon!D. S., Illinois
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: RainyDaisy
Reviews.Content: I like the feature of the Mayday button on the Kindle fire HDX.  I can contact Mayday and they take care of any problem that I seem to be having with My my Kindle fire HDX.  Another feature that I really like is the voice recognition, and so I am getting lazy,  I now use the voice recognition for all of the typing that I need to do.  This is quicker, and it saves me a lot of time.  I have used the camera just a little bit and it takes really good clear pictures.  I have watched a movie on my Kindle fire HDX and the sound is clear and the movies are perfect.  I am very pleased with the Kindle fire HDX.
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9 inches, HDX display, Wi-Fi, 32GB- includes special offers

Reviews.Author: smac46r "smac46r"
Reviews.Content: If this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" had an SD and HDMI slot, I would give it 5 stars.  If you are really only looking for access to the web, email, Facebook, video content and apps this tablet is fantastic.  It connects to my wireless printer, so I can conduct Ebay selling on it.  Has great wireless range, and is crystal clear.  The camera on the rear is fine - especially in daylight.  LED flash does not go much farther than a few feet, so low light pics are not great (no biggie for me).  I bought the 32 GB, and spent a fair amount of time comparing the iPad Air to it, and at such a lower price, this tablet is was a no brainer.  Bought during an Amazon deal day, it was $40 off the "regular" price.  With the comparable iPad Air being $599 (NEVER going on sale), and this model HDX costing $389, there was no way I was willing to spend an extra $210.  I would definitely recommend this tablet.  Has worked flawlessly so far, and the live (US based) "Mayday" help is fantastic.  LOVE IT!
Reviews.Title: If I bought this before my MacBook Air, it would be my only computer.

Reviews.Author: derek corson
Reviews.Content: first purchased my wife a kindle reader. used daily till the batteries died. bought her an upgrade and my daughter got number one. i finally broke down and got the first color kindle. again used daily till the batteries die. looked at the 8.9 and thought about it until Amazon had a special, so no excuses! 64 gb all out, love it. havent seen anything better yet!
Reviews.Title: wow

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Was a gift to me. User friendly, this is my 1st kindle. Easy to read from the screen& I like the auto-brightness feature. Great battery life, charge every few days. Saves me from opening my large laptop for simple tasks such as checking email, a recipe or reading a book. I really like the malware screen protector kit I put on it too.
Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Author: Deon Rosegreen
Reviews.Content: The kindle hdx is an awesome machine. I've done a lot of tablet research and I was unable to find any other tablet with as much ram and processor speed. A huge benefit is the wifi range. My iPhone could not find the network as to the kindle could see it and even had two bars. (That's insane) pretty much the only cons I have are the lack of none expandable memory which at this point isn't that much if an issue. Secondly the semi closed app market. Things like iTunes sync you have to pay for but again this is a minor issue. All in all I couldn't ask for a better tab. Money well spent if you ask me.
Reviews.Title: Impressive

Reviews.Author: GFRESH
Reviews.Content: The is my first tablet, i hve been watching "the kindle fire hdx 8.9 vs the ipad" for a few months, until i decided to get thet kindle. I even thik my wife is jealous that my KF is better than her I
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: garry shavers
Reviews.Content: Very nice screen is amazing does everything I have ask it to do. Still testing it.. I read lots of reviews and I am glad I went with this kindle.
Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Author: K. Lange
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is the best tablet for media consumption there is. I have 9 Tablets including 4 kindles and I always reach for my HDX 8.9 first.There are a coulple of advertised features that are more help than hype:Printing: you need an app which is free but any tablet can print to a wireless printer with the right software.Office Suite: is read only.Rear facing camera: Is OK but I don't have a lot of need to take pictures sittin on my couch watchin' a movie. Also the slide the tablet out of the Origami case to expose the camera thing is more cute than usefull.Second screen, only for Samsung tvs and PS/3s Not exactly a wide market.Miracast: The device they recommend for the kindle  has only a 3 out of 5 star rating and costs $59, and then you still have to have an hdmi cable from it to the TV. I haven't got up the guts to risk it yet. I would've rather they kept the hardware port.Display: Gorgeous.Processor: Fast. The tablet can navigate as fast as I can swipe.Some of the stuff that deserves the Hype:Mayday: its everything they say it is.64GB: I can watch all day and all night if I have the power for it.New Buttons: These are way better than the old especially using them through a case.text to speech:  you got like 6 different english voices to choose from with the HDX and they sound very realistic.Origami Case:  Thinnest Rotatable standing case you'll ever find. Holding the tablet in with magnets is strange, but you get used to it.Better wifi:  My HD8.9 had problems with my router, and I would have to recycle my router once every day or so to get it back on line. My HDX has no such problems.
Reviews.Title: Excellent for Media consumption

Reviews.Author: Joyce Schwartz
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning what this piece of technology can do. So far am having fun with it and looking forward to learning more.
Reviews.Title: Gramma is getting technology smart

Reviews.Author: Paul Shetley
Reviews.Content: Not compatible with flash player or dolphin browser like my kindle hd was. Other than that...Great! I recommend this item.
Reviews.Title: Great...but.

Reviews.Author: Lissak
Reviews.Content: For the most part I really like my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 64 GB. The apps are fun and I read on it all the time. Most things work really well.It has a couple of problems though.... the battery drains fast and the Silk Browser crashes often, which is really annoying. Hopefully they fix that through a software update.  I'll probably come back and give it another star if they do.
Reviews.Title: It's fun

Reviews.Author: Diane Williams
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize it would come with an ID already on it that I had to changed before I could try to order a book.  Kept getting an error message.  Had to have my daughter help me and after a LONG time she figured out it had to unregisterd and then registered under me.  Also I thought It had the MAYDAY button it.  When I ordered it, it didn't say anything one way or the other so I assumed it would be on the Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Thought it had MAYDAY and had to be UNREGISTERED.

Reviews.Author: Julianne Henning
Reviews.Content: I have to turn it off and restart all the time. Apps hang up and it locks up a lot. Not sure what the issue is. Maybe this particular one is a lemon.  I really miss my old kindle fire. Not a lick of problems with it.
Reviews.Title: miss my original kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Dar
Reviews.Content: Not happy I can,t watch videos.  I cannot play some of my games.  Could not get itunes.  Missing to many things I like to do.
Reviews.Title: disappointing

Reviews.Author: Thomas Peterson
Reviews.Content: I paid over five hundred bucks for my laptop and this smokes it. Definately a very good buy. I totally reccommend
Reviews.Title: It beats my laptop

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My first generation ipad had just about had it so my husband got me the new kindle for Christmas.  The ads had us convinced it was just as good as an iPad just better priced. Although I like the excellent picture and lightweight feel, I still miss my ipad. I find kindle's android platform much less user friendly and am disappointed I can't get a bunch of my favorite apps on my kindle. I can't seem to customize the home or lock screen either. If you've always had Android products than I'm sure kindle is right from you...but if you're thinking of making a shift from Apple to Android I think you'll find yourself homesick like me.
Reviews.Title: Miss my ipad

Reviews.Author: Mark S. Marinelli
Reviews.Content: No audio for Mayday feature.Even with a great signal it consistently logs off.Nice color/graphics.Relatively fast despite problems listed.Wonder if I simply have a lemon?
Reviews.Title: It's okay I guess

Reviews.Author: Wilma Huffman
Reviews.Content: Amazon has put too many limitations on the tablet, ie., slimmed down browser and selective use of apps etc.  not the android you might think you are buying.  Also, I bought a case with an opening for the camera, but the tablet still thinks I have to push the tablet up out of the case to use it.  Very inconvenient and MAYDAY has no solution.  When in the case, if you open the camera app a big sign comes up on your screen-in the middle of where you are trying to take a picture, and says "push up to take a picture"
Reviews.Title: Too many limitations

Reviews.Author: DIANE KELLEY
Reviews.Content: I have always loved the Kindle products, but this is by far the most amazing of the group. The picture is crystal clear and sound is much improved. My only comment is the location of the power and volume buttons - they are on the back edges and are not easy to get to with a cover on. I liked the edge placement better.
Reviews.Title: Amazing!

Reviews.Author: T. Miller
Reviews.Content: Overall I am pleased with the device.  It is a thin, light unit with an excellent display.  Battery life is excellent.  The system software is robust but not perfect, I experienced two instances of network lockup in a month, both times were resolved by a power cycle.  (In each case, the OS indicated the wireless network was up, but an application reported the network was unavailable.)  The Amazon Prime library has a good free movie selection, although they obviously prefer to sell programming -- which is priced competitively with other on-line media services.  Applications are easily available only through the Amazon app store.  Some folks will view the curated Amazon app selection as a good thing -- "sanitized for your protection".  Coming to Amazon from the wide-open Google Play environment, I was mildly annoyed by Amazon's modestly more-restrictive selection. For those who chafe at Amazon's selection, a bit of web searching will show you how to sideload apps to the Kindle (Amazon does provide the ES File Explorer app, which is a very useful tool for the task).
Reviews.Title: Quite good, with one limitation

Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: This is my first ever tablet.  I wasn't sure whether to go with a Windows or Google-based product but ultimately decided on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 gig because of it's top-rated screen quality.  I've only had it for a little over a week and so far I am really impressed!  I know from reading a lot of reviews that many people would like to see more apps such as what you can get at the Google store...I must admit there a few that I have on my Android phone that I can't get on Amazon but I am hopeful that they will eventually get added.  The tablet is incredibly thin and light!  I did also purchase the Origami polyurethane case.  It does add significant weight to the Kindle Fire HDX but... it does provide great protection with a stand that folds into some cool designs...a nice change from most stand cases.  Overall I am really satisfied with my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 gig as I've loaded my gmail, and most of the apps that are most important to me.  We are now a 4- Kindle family!
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!

Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. Amazon Prime is DEFINITELY worth it. The selection of free movies and tv shows its WAY better than Netflix. If I had to pick one thing I wish this had was the ability to hook my external hard drive right to it and play movies that are on it but I can still copy movies to it. I also like the fact that you can side load Google Chrome and Gmail without rooting the Kindle and voiding warranty. Memory upgrades WAY cheaper than iPad too...
Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!

Reviews.Author: marchelle
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is amazing!! I couldn't ask for a better tablet. Its inexspensive, very easy to download things..and its quite simple for a five year old. I would recommend anyone that is searching for a tablet to go with the kindle fire. You will not be disappointed!. Five star all the way!
Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Author: Howard F. Mandel
Reviews.Content: I'm a dialysis patient and as such am strapped to a chair for hours three times a week.  The HDX provides me with books, TV, movies and music, all in the highest quality available.  All media at my fingertips when I only have one hand available is just the best.
Reviews.Title: Everything as advertised

Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Love it! So much better than my old one. Faster and the colors. It's so far everything that I wanted Thank You
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Patricia E. Glander
Reviews.Content: This review refers to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 64 g with Verizon 4g LTE.I haven't had this device long enough to speak about its durability, but am so impressed with the helpful folks one contacts via Mayday, I just had to write a review in praise of this feature. If, like me,find you are befuddled by new technology and unable to figure out how to do what you wish to do even after viewing the tutorials etc.,  don't worry.  Mayday provides assistance within seconds of tapping the button. The  folks who have responded have been courteous and knowledgeable - and extremely patient.As for the tablet itself, all the functions and features I've tried so far work as advertised  The display is gorgeous. The rear camera is more than adequate and though the colors are not absolutely true, picture resolution is good and the auto focus and flash work perfectly. The silk browser is quick.  I've had no problems with it.  The sound quality is good and the volume is more than adequate.  I won't be needing external speakers, only ear buds or ear phones so as not to disturb others.No tablet is perfect and there may be shoal waters ahead, but to know help is available when I run into a problem is worth every penny I paid.  Thank you, Amazon.
Reviews.Title: Mayday is great

Reviews.Author: larry39208
Reviews.Content: I own a retina display iPad, an iPad mini, a Kindle fire and a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0.  The HDX 8.9 is the perfect size and the display is much better than the retina display iPad.  The HDX will do anything any of the other tablets will do and does it faster and better.  The only thing I wish is that it had access to the android app store, but Amazon's app store is fairly comparable.  This is a great buy!
Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever!

Reviews.Author: v "txcwgrlmom"
Reviews.Content: I have been with Amazon e readers since day one. I moved up to a kindle fire HD 7 inch last year when they came out. I was not sure I would like a color e reader but since I have quite a few magazine subscriptions too I decided to upgrade so I could discontinue paper subscriptions. I love my 7 inch and I decided to get an 8.9 too, after looking at different tablets in that size range. The color is superb and the tablet is so light.  I love Amazon's customer service, ease of use, audible, and music on my kindle fire HDX. I also am using some of the other apps like calendar, notes, etc. To be more productive at work. I am hoping more business related apps will be made available for the kindle. I just installed easy grader and skyward which is helpful for my job. Thank you Amazon for a wonderful tablet.
Reviews.Title: Awesome and wonderful.

Reviews.Author: J. Fahs
Reviews.Content: First, the things you read about the Kindle are true. Amazingly light, awesome screen, incredible integration with Amazon content, great app store experience. It charges quickly and the battery lasts for a long time. It is probably the best thing to happen to your Kindle library (text looks amazing).Folks who are moving from other Android or iOS devices will need to adjust their expectations about apps. While the app store is well laid out, there are a lot of apps that aren't available on Kindle or work on Kindle Fire, but aren't available on Kindle HDX. Amazon needs to either support the google play store or increase their efforts to get apps out in order for the HDX to be the best out there.That being said, I would buy again for all the positives and I'm guessing Amazon continues to improve the app situation and I'll get to upgrade this review to 5 stars.
Reviews.Title: Great Product (with caveats)

Reviews.Author: joan
Reviews.Content: There are not enough words for me to describe how much I love, love, love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I am a member of Amazon Prime and this suits me to a T.  I love the fact that I can snuggle on my couch or in bed and watch flawlessly streaming movies and my favorite TV shows.  I purchased the 64 GB and I'm not sorry that I did.  There is no buffering during the streaming and I have lots of room to download movies to take with me wherever I wish to.  The display is crystal clear, also.  I can almost count their eyelashes!  lol  As you can tell I am very much in love with my kindle!!
Reviews.Title: Awesome!!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the device. It is so sleek and lightweight. Awesome device. However, I don't understand why Amazon does not provide support for installing android apps from Google play. I had to do a workaround to get dropbox, google play music, gmail, and my other favorite apps from google play onto my device. I had to manually copy apk files and install them. The whole process took 2-3 hours to get these apps on kindle fire hdx. I was missing these apps so much that at one point I was ready to return it back, but then researched a bit and got these apps installed. Now I am loving my device.
Reviews.Title: Very light weight nice device - Not that good app support

Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: What a difference over my old Kindle.  Com had one when they first came out.  This one is amazing.  My phone and check computer are lonely because I can pretty much do everything now on my Kindle
Reviews.Title: product review

Reviews.Author: Maria Pluemer
Reviews.Content: I would recommend to all my friends and family. Love the screen size, yet it is still light weight and fits in my purse. Beautiful graphics and so easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and easy to use.

Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire ND and love the HDX so far. Definitely a nice upgrade but when booting up the screen is upside down. Not a huge issue but a little annoying.
Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from the Fire HD with one irritating issue

Reviews.Author: CKA "CKA"
Reviews.Content: I love most everything about my new Kindle.  The larger viewing surface, the color display, the sound, the two cameras and I really appreciate the lighter weight.  It makes it easier to take with me.My only complaint would be that it is sometimes difficult to locate the on/off switch and the volume switch.  Other than those minor annoyances, it is superb!  Thank you Kindle..
Reviews.Title: Love It!

Reviews.Author: Jason McDonald
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I ever purchased. And I love it. Thank you amazon for making a quality tablet.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: NancyK
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my (grown) granddaughter for Christmas. She was thrilled!  Her Facebook post read something like "status coming to you from my new Kindle Fire HDX.  It's amazing!  And my Mimi spoils me!"  She's right, I do.
Reviews.Title: Christmas gift

Reviews.Author: LUV2READ
Reviews.Content: I am a loyal customer. This is my 4th kindle and I am pleased. However, the ONLY thing that bugs me is I have to reboot my kindle way too much in order for it to work properly. Even when my WiFi bar is at full strength(5bars)!  A few times I couldn't hear the rep from Maytag. But overall, it's lighter, thinner and the Maytag feature is a cool addition. I would recommend this to anyone.
Reviews.Title: Love it but...

Reviews.Author: galtex
Reviews.Content: My original Kindle Fire, bought in 2011, is still going strong, but the new Kindle HDX 8.9" is awesome!!!I have clicked on the "mayday" button and both Nancy and Molly were both patient and helpful.  Thanks for another great product.
Reviews.Title: I LOVE my new Kindle!!!!!

Reviews.Author: John Zion
Reviews.Content: I love it so far. It does everything all the other tablets do, and at a great price compared to others. I need to find other stuff to do on it to justify my need to play with it more.
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Gail Sims
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle fire 7" about three years ago.  I upgraded to the kindle fire HDX 8.9 this Christmas.  The difference in amazingly wonderful.  Thanks for a great tablet at a low price.
Reviews.Title: amazing

Reviews.Author: Leonard D. Jompulsky
Reviews.Content: An exceptionally fine tablet. Great vivid colors, light weight and fun to use and easy to navigate.Very happy that my children bought this for me.
Reviews.Title: Just what I thought it would be,

Reviews.Author: shi guo ping
Reviews.Content: it's perfect and better than ipad mini.the price is more competitive.also the service for Amazon is the best of all(Mayday is wonderful)
Reviews.Title: i like it very much, the display is very clearly, process is so fast. the Mayday function is wonderful.

Reviews.Author: Diva45
Reviews.Content: I just love my new Kindle HDX 8.9, I already own the Kindle Fire HD 32GB "7". It's easy to use, & I just love Amazon, I'm really excited that I now have a rear camera, cause I just love taking pictures. It's very light easy to use, I'm trying to get use to how fast it goes. Anyone who don't have one please purchase one it's really something you and the whole family can used.
Reviews.Title: My new Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: BillFL
Reviews.Content: The resolution is excellent, response times very good.Problem: intermittently unit stopped with the blue screen of death; upon rebooting blue screen still displayed; after several minutes unit would reboot but reboot extremely slow.Occasionally, when using back arrow unit aborted with totally black screen; same reboot problem.Tech support made assurances fix would be downloaded; did not happenStill some hidden bugs in the overall system
Reviews.Title: Ongoing problems

Reviews.Author: H. McCaddin
Reviews.Content: I have only had this for a few days, but I love it! The battery is long lasting so far, but haven't watched movies or anything yet. It was a breeze to get set up and going. Very user friendly and so skinny! I have yet to have an issue with it. Will add to review if something negative pops up in the future. Am very happy now!
Reviews.Title: I am a happy camper!

Reviews.Author: Diamond D
Reviews.Content: I had a HD fire, and thought it was good, but the HDX blows the HD fire away! It's so much faster, sleeker, and lighter. Great price, great product!
Reviews.Title: Love the HDX

Reviews.Author: maam
Reviews.Content: worked right out the box very easy to maneuver screen brightness is adjustabel and or adjust for you love that feature. HD quality is fantastic. still figuring out features but very happy with. light weight fits in my bag without weighing it down. battery charges doe snot last it you are playing games for hours on end and forget the time! oops! need to buy a second one so hubby will leave mine alone
Reviews.Title: love it!!

Reviews.Author: tetvet6768
Reviews.Content: Bar none - nothing less can be said. Great screen, great color, great graphics, great lay-out, great UI, great apps, easy set-up and integration with other components (Kindle PaperWhite 3G) and previous purchases of books, etc.
Reviews.Title: GREAT !

Reviews.Author: Kellen Wynn
Reviews.Content: Incredibly impressed with this tablet. Startlingly light, fast and responsive. Sure, the Appstore is lacking, but side loading apps is super simple. Mayday works perfectly, just as advertised.You can't get a better tablet, this size with this kind of hardware, for the price. Definitely recommend!----------UPDATE------------This is just a personal opinion, and I'm not going to dock a star or anything. I just don't like how the charger fits into the device. It sits at a kind of cock-eyed angle, sort of pointed up. I feel like I'm breaking it every time I plug it in to charge. Not a big deal at all! Just be kind of careful.ALSO! I'd recommend getting rid of the special offers. (which you can do at anytime, for $15 plus tax) I felt like it really drained my battery very quickly. Again, just a personal opinion. My original opinion stands, that this is the best tablet you can get for the money, and really is the best tablet I have ever used.----------UPDATE #2----------Finally having issues at a little under three months, I knew such an amazing device has to have a flaw. Starting 3 days ago, my Kindle started spazzing out (the only way to describe it). It wouldn't select the book I requested, instead it opened Silk and navigated me through 2 yahoo pages and a Wikipedia entry, all by itself. It freaked out while scrolling, arbitrarily zooming in an out of pictures on twitter and Facebook. While reading, it would highlight words and navigate me all through the reading menus and stuff. It was exhausting. I did a factory reset last night, thinking it was something I downloaded. This did not resolve the issue. So I called Amazon Customer Service today for help. Within 5 minutes, after explaining my problem, they offered to replace my device, which will be here by Saturday, 03/15. I am docking one star, because Customer Service does not attest to the quality of the device. I haven't dropped my Kindle a single time in 3 months, it's barely even been out of my house. These issues were just out of the blue and random.Other than this issue, the device was great and I'm really looking forward to my replacement and jumping back into my books and tv shows :D
Reviews.Title: Wonderful, with one tiny issue.

Reviews.Author: Shorian "gadget guru"
Reviews.Content: Kudos to Amazon for quarterly installment payments on the Kindle. I wouldn't have been able to buy it otherwise. I am sure that the HDX will be discounted at some point next year after the holiday season. But even so, it will be a major purchase if I had to pay for it all at once.I owned a Kindle 8.9 HD which I recently sold to purchase the HDX. The HDX is a tremendous improvement over the older model in nearly every aspect. The display is brighter and clearer. Performance is very snappy. Setup was easy. I use MS Outlook for my email and all I had to do was provide my password. The Kindle app handled all the server setup automatically.I love the dual cameras, especially the new rear facing one. It has an LED flash and image stabilization, a great improvement. I also love the new voice recognition feature. I use this feature all the time on my Nexus 7 to dictate email and do searches. This helps someone like myself who has arthritis. For me, this was the main selling point.I haven't needed the new live help yet, but I am curious how well it works. I know I will eventually try it to satisfy my curiosity.Games and video play very smoothly, unlike the previous model that tended to freeze up at times. The speed difference is very noticeable.It is also noticeably lighter than the previous model. My arm and hand don't get tired from holding it to read.At this point, I don't know what Amazon could do to top this model.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Wi-Fi 16 GB

Reviews.Author: D. Craig
Reviews.Content: I have purchased most of the Kindle devices at one point or another. I really like the Fire and the HD 8.9 inch model. But the HDX is a real jump in technology. The screen is so good that reading magazines is very easy. Movies and apps also look outstanding. The device itself is much lighter than the HD model, much faster, and has a much better screen.Initially I was just going to stay with the HD model because I was happy with the Kindle. I bought an HDX model, took one look at the screen, and decided to keep it for myself and give them the HD model.If you are a long-time Kindle user and are happy with the HD model, don't count out the HDX. The speed and resolution of the device, along with the new OS, makes a lot of small but significant differences that add up to an almost required upgrade.
Reviews.Title: A real leap forward from HD model

Reviews.Author: Marilyn WK
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and I love it! I just cannot get over how thin and lightweight it is! It did take a moment for me to figure out that the on/off button was on the back and not the front or edge where the illustration said it was. It literally took less than five minutes to set this up with both of my email providers, connect to Twitter and Facebook as well as my home wireless. It was more than half charged so I just plugged it in while I was setting it up and it is good to go! I can't wait to start using it.The lack of choice in covers for this Kindle tablet was underwhelming. Compared to the last big Kindle introduction (the Kindle Fire HD last Christmas), I was really disappointed. Sure there is the origami case which I'd hoped they would come out with for the Kindle, but only black, red, and blue?
Reviews.Title: Very lightweight Kindle!

Reviews.Author: Gayle Street
Reviews.Content: I like the bigger screen with a clear picture for viewing movies and reading books.  I also like the live chat feature when I need help.
Reviews.Title: The bigger screen is better.

Reviews.Author: john l thompson
Reviews.Content: I really enjoying my new Kindle fire HDX 8.9 and for my first tablet I think this is by far the best.  Had use the Mayday button for a little problem, the technician was a great help I will definitely recommend this product.
Reviews.Title: Very satisfied

Reviews.Author: Oz
Reviews.Content: BOOM! Another win for Amazon....Light, fast, functional and perfectly priced. Whoever you buy this for will be very satisfied and happy!
Reviews.Title: Look out Tablet World!

Reviews.Author: Danilo M. Mijares
Reviews.Content: So far I enjoyed using this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  Picture and sound are fantastic.  It is very easily to hold, not like the Apple iPad.  Overall - no complaints.
Reviews.Title: No complaint

Reviews.Author: Grams910
Reviews.Content: I have been using a Kindle 3G Touch - so I gave myself a late Birthday present - early Christmas present.  So far I have had no trouble with it and I love it.  Still getting use to it.  Need to find good apps for it.  So far have had trouble with finding what I am looking for.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: Chickpea
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 68 year old mother (shhh...don't tell her I told you how old she is).  She absolutely loves it.  Keeps raving about the clarity of the screen, the instant help button, and how easy it is to use (which means she isn't calling me to ask how to work it - bonus!)  Seems like a win-win gift for all!
Reviews.Title: Endorsed by Moms

Reviews.Author: Katheen A. Sitzman
Reviews.Content: Love the fact that it has two cameras and can print to a wireless printer.  And do enjoy the larger screen
Reviews.Title: Another Great Kindle

Reviews.Author: William M. lee
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is by far the best Tablet/Reader on the market. It has a stunningly crystal-clear display that not only enhances the reader function of the device, but also allows for breathtaking video replay and picture-taking. I own a B & N Nook as well, and the Kindle blows it away in nearly every aspect. I highly recommend this device if you're looking for a full-functioning Tablet that also serves as an e-Reader.
Reviews.Title: On Top

Reviews.Author: LostITGuy
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HDX as the kindle versions of books I needed were $120+ cheaper.  As far as the HDX unit itself, I've been very impressed with the build quality and construction.  My unit does not exhibit the blue tinge that I've read about in other reviews, and backlight quality is phenomenal.  I use my HDX primarily for reading and web browsing, and both have been very enjoyable on the unit.  Both Kindle books and PDFs look absolutely gorgeous on the 2560x1600 screen (even older scanned texts).  I ended up purchasing the 8.9" as the 7" screen was too small for me.  Web browsing with the silk browser also looks great although there is stuttering on some bloated pages (I have not tried side-loading the Google Play store and using chrome yet).  Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and can definitely recommend the unit to anyone using it primarily for web browsing/reading.As far as the special offers, they only show up on the home/lock screen and are not annoying.  I haven't paid to remove them as they really have not bothered me (and I've been lazy)
Reviews.Title: Quality tablet for reading/web browsing.

Reviews.Author: Dorothy L
Reviews.Content: This version, so far, has a faster Silk browser than the HD version and hasn't frozen up yet.  This was a big issue with the HD version.  I've only had the HDX three days, but so far so good.  Other features are great and the improvements have made it better.  I love the Fire, so I hope the past browser issues are really resolved in this version.  I haven't had an opportunity to try Mayday, but probably will soon to learn how to use some of the features I haven't utilized before.
Reviews.Title: So far, so good

Reviews.Author: Ms. Cynthia A. Hart
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE my new Kindle!!!  I bought the Kindle Fire when it was first introduced 2 years ago.  Have been waiting to see what new Kindle would be introduced this year.  Once I saw this one, I knew that I was ready to buy a new one.  It also have a larger harddrive which I was looking for.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: m
Reviews.Content: I have only had mine a couple of weeks but so far I really like it. Very easy to use it has all that I need on it. Glad there is a camera front and rear. It would be nice if it were open to more apps.
Reviews.Title: Very nice

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my HDX 8.9! The movies in hd are amazing to watch. One thing I have noticed is that if I want the battery to last I need to dim the brightness of the screen. Whenever I watch a movie though I make sure to change back to auto brightness
Reviews.Title: HDX is amazing!

Reviews.Author: Adam Cusick
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 should be fantastic but it misses the mark by a long shot.  I'm a geek through and through.  HTC One, Nexus7 (2nd gen), 3 rokus, raspberri pi, media sever, I mean the works.  When I had the opportunity to try out this device I read the specs and it looks pretty good on paper.  It is however limited severely by the shell that amazon has placed around it.  Not having true android market, gmail, and access to your purchased android apps makes this device ridiculous.  There is currently no root for this device as it is so new.  Those things are a problem that Amazon should work at fixing.  I'd like to see this tablet with a 49.99 unlock from amazon allowing you to use it as an actual android tablet.  Then you'd have the great specs that they've put together combined with the full functionality of android.  Bottom line, if you're wanting this don't. Go get the Galaxy Note 8 inch.  It will do everything this will plus more.  Price is about equal.
Reviews.Title: Great idea, very poor delivery.

Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She loves it. Can't get her off the darn thing. Recommend to all.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Flashfire
Reviews.Content: I've had this for about four months now, purchased during the promotional period around Christmas. Prior to that I didn't have much use for tablets but this one has changed my mind and become part of my daily routine.First, the audio/visual side of it works very well for me. Obviously the HD display creates very sharp images and video playback runs smoothly, looks excellent (with a high-quality source), and I have had no complaints about the sound. I added the origami case and while some people say the design doesn't really affect the sound, I do think it improves it slightly by helping redirect it back toward you just a bit. Even without it, you can hear everything just fine.I can't really get into all the deeper details about how the tablet itself works except to say navigation is simple and easy for me. The carousel is a snap to customize as far as showing what you want on it with the rest of your apps elsewhere.I mostly use the tablet for e-books, some games, and Amazon Prime videos. I've also propped the tablet up in the kitchen to follow a recipe without having to print something out or go back to the CPU to double-check something.  I have always been a traditionalist when it comes to reading, preferring the physical feel of a book in my hands, but having it on a tablet compared to a smaller device has made me change my mind.  It's probably a standard option, but I also prefer being able to set it as white text on a black background since my eyes are a little more sensitive to bright things than usual.  It just helps keep them from getting strained.A major selling point of the device is the ability to watch video through Amazon Prime.  The simple fact of the matter is you aren't going to maximize the potential of the Kindle Fire without it, because it opens up a ton of viewing options when it comes to movies and TV shows.Not everything is free through the instant video service, of course, but there's still a whole lot of stuff you can access that way.  You just have to see what the options are for each film or show.  Some allow you to download directly to the device while others don't.This should be showing up in the right place, but I bought the 64 GB version, wifi only, because for the most part it's an at-home device.  When I thought about what I pay for home internet vs. what I'd probably be paying to stream or download over a 4G connection, it made more sense for me to get the wifi-only version and live with knowing that if I'm going to take a vacation or otherwise be out of town, I'd have to either download stuff directly to the tablet before I go or hope to have a wifi signal somewhere.As an example, I took an overnight trip out of town and even though I stayed at a place with wifi, I didn't bother getting it.  I just downloaded a few episodes of a TV show to watch and that was that.  I also took a two-day train ride that did not have wifi, and I was able to watch an entire season of a TV show during the trip.  The HD episodes took up about 3 GB each so I came pretty close to maxing out the storage capacity, but as soon as I finished watching an episode I just deleted it.Be aware that once you start watching a show or movie you've downloaded, if you're not connected you have 48 hours to "verify" things again or you won't be able to watch that particular download until you do.  This is really a great feature of the device, since you can actually watch downloaded stuff while being completely offline for a bit.  It made the train trip extremely convenient, and I also got through most of two e-books by the end of it as well.I find the battery life to be pretty much as advertised.  It holds up well even when watching a few videos in succession, though I often charge it when I'm not using it.The camera gives a good enough image, but the examples I've taken with it seemed to have a bit of a contrast issue compared to my smartphone or the actual camera I have.  I'm not the kind of person to go around taking pictures or video with a tablet anyway, so it's not a big deal to me.  The camera itself was hardly a factor in what I decided to get.One small criticism I have is probably not a device-specific thing, but it does bear mentioning.  I have it set to automatically update my apps, though from time to time an app will prompt me to update and send me to the appstore only for there to be no "update" option.  On a few occasions, I've had to uninstall then reinstall the app in order for the update to register.  The last couple weeks, at least, apps I had that problem with seem to have auto-updated fine, so this may be fixed.By the way, if you're concerned about the "special offers" being intrusive or anything like that, they're not. When you access the device, they're no more than a displayed ad that goes away when you unlock the device, and you're on to what you want to do.  there's a tab at the top of the home screen to view all offers if you want to.  You can also spend $15 (I think) if you want to have them removed, so you're not stuck with them if you originally buy a device that comes with them.Overall, for what I got the tablet for, it meets or exceeds my needs. It's highly recommended.
Reviews.Title: A very solid device

Reviews.Author: Chad Michael Wright
Reviews.Content: One star is really a generous rating for this item. The product arrived fine and quickly. That is were the good rating ends. First day of using it the camera would shut down for no reason. As it was Christmas with family photos are super important. Contacted amazon and they sent another and more camera problems except it would shut down entire device.  Contacted amazon again and  third device would not hold a charge. I returned third and final device for a full refund.
Reviews.Title: BAD BAD BAD

Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: Having so much fun with my new Kindle fire hdx.  Movies, music,e-mail, Facebook, surfing the internet.  Very easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Having so much fun

Reviews.Author: Atomtraveler
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle, because I have an Amazon Prime account and enjoy reading.  It does have a decent amount of apps.  But if your expecting the availability of apps similar to what Android or Apple has, then the Kindle may not be for you.  The size and weight of the Kindle HDX 8.9 is great, very lightweight.  I use mine with just a skin as protection.  The screen on the Kindle is its strong point, absolutely great for watching videos or reading books, superior to Apple or Android in my opinion.  The battery life so far has been great, for my usage.  But like any other tablet, it depends on how much you use it and what you use it for. Have yet to use the mayday feature, mostly because I haven't had the need to yet, which is a good thing.  Disappointed in Amazons epub reader selection, and they make it somewhat difficult to place your own epub books or documents from a source other than Amazon.  So, if you have an Amazon Prime account, and use it often, then this is a great purchase.
Reviews.Title: Excellent performance but...

Reviews.Author: melody worley
Reviews.Content: it is so much lighter. it fits in my purse. i think it is just sexy... i am so happy i traded in for the new model.
Reviews.Title: i like it

Reviews.Author: Jerry J. Sechrist
Reviews.Content: We are so pleased with our purchase of the Kindle Fire HDX.  We highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a tablet.
Reviews.Title: Great buy

Reviews.Author: robert a kabase
Reviews.Content: I find it slow.  Now after 6 months of ownership the item has locked up on me and the kindle is getting hot to the touch and I am unable to get it to respond to remove and item or turn off!!!!I am unable to get to Mayday option...lot of good that option does me.I had better luck with the app to read books.I was looking for a table that could do it all.  Read magazines, books a game or two and search.  Not working out like I thought and a lot heavier than I expected.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: dkarger
Reviews.Content: Love the product but rather dismayed when the play store is not available on the Kindle and a lot of the apps that I had purchased were not available to me or even available in the Kindle store. Of course there is always a way around everything which I found but why would you make it difficult to begin with.
Reviews.Title: Excited then let down with app availability

Reviews.Author: Phillis Combs
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the new Kindle Fire.  It does not come with an adobe flash like the old kindle did and now I can not watch a lot of videos.  Wish I had not bought this one and just kept on using the old 7".  They need to come up with a fix for this.
Reviews.Title: Can't play certain videos

Reviews.Author: TAMMY PHILLIPS
Reviews.Content: I just wish you could get Google Play on it.  I can't play POGO games on it.  I wish it had more apps like checkout 51 and other apps for us couponers, other than that I love it.
Reviews.Title: Love It!!!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Michael"
Reviews.Content: I love the picture,there is one thing that I miss from the previous kindle fire. The previous one had a tiny orange light, that told you it was charging. It turned green when fully charged.  I always used to check it's status.
Reviews.Title: miss the light.

Reviews.Author: Albert N. Haler
Reviews.Content: This item has meet all of my expectations.  I have steamed movies and also downloaded movies both worked flawlessly.  The 8.9 HDX for my needs is the perfect size, easy to handle and not to big to carry with you.
Reviews.Title: Kindle 8.9 HDX

Reviews.Author: James B. Kuminecz
Reviews.Content: My constant companion for work and play and leisure reading. Suggest that you get the HDX Fire8.9 Wi-Fi,64 Gb.After four months have still not made use of all it features. NEEDS A WIRELESS CHARGING CAPABILITY. Has my Catholic book of prayers and Bubble installed. Has apps for banking Drug Store as well as medical reminders and references.
Reviews.Title: First thing I check in the mornig and the last thing I read at night.

Reviews.Author: Gurjeet Bal
Reviews.Content: I find it more useful than I thought would be. It is light so doesn't strain hands, It is fast and screen resolution is great. Its fun to watch small short videos which I never had time or ease to watch it on laptop. There are many apps now for it so there is no issue regarding the usability. I am glad I got it. price is also cool compared to similar products.Only annoying thing is that I can not share prime movies on it with family member account but that is more of Prime account rather than the device itself.
Reviews.Title: Light, fast, beautiful

Reviews.Author: Ewenice "ewenice"
Reviews.Content: For the price, it should have come w/a protective screen cover.  Also, there are so many times, I've clicked on certain things and the message "that I need Google Play Store for whatever it is I'm trying to do" keeps coming up and it's very frustrating.  Kindle and Google need to get together somehow and make things easier for people such as I am.  All in all, I'm glad I made the purchase and I hope to learn all I need to get the full use of it.  After that, I'm sure I'll love it even more!
Reviews.Title: Love the Fire!

Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I use the Kindle Fire HDX almost every night to watch videos as I unwind from the day and gradually fall asleep.  The screen quality is just beautiful for movies, photos, etc.I gave only four stars because of the difficulty in having to sideload apps from Google Play.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Best for Videos

Reviews.Author: Muriel J. Farnkoff
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle, however I just had some problems with the Zynga game, Words with Friends and was unable to use it for a month. I know this is not Amazon's fault, but thought I would let you know.I did not give it 5 stars, because I am a little disappointed in the life of the battery.  I'm pretty sure it was advertised as having a longer life than my older Kindle, but it seems like 3 hrs., give or take, is all I get from a full charge.  Is this the correct time I should be getting?I really like the Mayday button, as I am still learning all the things that the HDX fire can do and it is so helpful to have someone you can ask a question of and get an answer !!!!
Reviews.Title: Like my new Kindle.

Reviews.Author: Lee100
Reviews.Content: I've been using the device for several hours now, I noticed several issues:The advertisement says HDX makes things easier to see in "any lighting conditions, including outdoors." this is misleading: even at maximum brightness it's hard to see what's on the screen when ambient light is bright (I tested it inside a car, it was bright outside, but the screen was not exposed to direct sunlight).The advertisement says Kindle has "12 hours mixed use" battery life, this is again misleading, the battery drains very quickly if you do anything at all, (down to 60% in less than one hour)A third issue is with the Camera:  when taking picture, the kindle was always trying to focus. it makes taking pictures difficult.
Reviews.Title: difficult to see outdoors, battery drains fast, camera doesn't work well.

Reviews.Author: Nicole K
Reviews.Content: In general, I'm pleased with my Kindle Fire HDX.  However, I do have an issue with wi-fi connectivity.  Quite often apps won't load or web pages due to the device thinking it's not connected to the internet when in fact it is.  The only way to fix this issue that I have found is to power the unit down and restart it.  This becomes a little annoying when I'm restarting it for the 4th time in one day.
Reviews.Title: Connectivity

Reviews.Author: C.C.
Reviews.Content: The graphics are great, the weight is amazingly light, BUT there are some small issues I'm having. When I press the power button nothing happens, I have to repeat that step a second time, this happens every time not once in a while. When reading the news the screen fades off just slightly, then goes back to total brightness, this is annoying to me. I'd hit Mayday but I had a terrible experience with the people who were suppose to help me, they didn't have a clue. I have a few days left to decide if I'll keep this HDX8.9, I hate to give it up, but these glitches are annoying.
Reviews.Title: The Good, The Bad and The UGLY

Reviews.Author: B. G. "MMA Fan"
Reviews.Content: Love my Fire HDX.  Plays video like a champ, streaming and otherwise.  The app selection is limited, yes. The silk browser is kinda sucky.  But! there are solutions to both via sideloading.
Reviews.Title: Sweet media machine!

Reviews.Author: greg bertrand
Reviews.Content: Awesome light bright quickConsThe screen gets smudged but not much you can do about thatWish there was some directions
Reviews.Title: really really like it

Reviews.Author: John Hanley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle (my 3rd) before Christmas. I have not been a big fan of reading devices before as they were too small.However, this Kindle Fire is big enough that I can use it whenever I want. I am seeing impaired and by double tapping a web page I can comfortably use this Kindle.Note: I do not use the Kindle for book reading (my girlfriend does and often wants it first after dinner). I use it primarily to keep up to date on my work or hobbies for which it is excellently purposed for me. My son uses it to watch Amazon Prime movies with ear-buds.Note: I don't remember when we bought the first Amazon Kindle (five years ago maybe), but all three continue to work with no issues. We have all of the Apple iPad generations also and I would say that they are very close in quality and ease of use. For my family Amazon Prime is the key factor (movies for everyone and the big screen for me and low cost books).
Reviews.Title: A bigger screen helps and is a big plus

Reviews.Author: Zito Medeiros
Reviews.Content: I must admit that the picture quality is excellent, but the sound is only mediocre.  It is quick and responds well.  The battery lasts a real long time.  My main disappointment is that the operating system is a modified version of Android.  As a result, many of the apps I am used to on my phone cannot be installed on the Kindle.  One of the main reasons I bought this Kindle was to read one of my magazines that is only digital now.  I downloaded the previous issue with no issues, but when I try to download the current version, I get an error claiming that I have to update some software.  Some of the apps not available are Google Now and Zinio,  I feel like I overpaid for this at $379.  I feel that I should haves hopped around for a Android 4.2 tablet, and i would probably have found something comparable for less than half the price.
Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Money

Reviews.Author: Cara
Reviews.Content: Cannot say enough about my Kindle - it replaces my lap top computer totally.  If I didn't work on my lap top I would probably never open it.  The display is amazing, the sound is clear and distinct, there are what seems like a "zillion" apps in the store.  I'm an avid reader and hate to be without new books. Searching for what you want takes longer than the purchase and transmission.  Does it all, beautifully. Again, LOVE IT!
Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love my Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Ingrid P. Long
Reviews.Content: I was researching the Kindle Fire for quite sometime and when the HDX came out, it was a no-brainer for me.  I really like that it isn't very heavy and it connects me to everything in an instant.  You really don't need more than 16GB.  The display is crisp and the great size screen at 8.9" is perfect. I also have the Special Offers which you really don't notice because you just swipe to "unlock" and it's gone :)
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB

Reviews.Author: gghia
Reviews.Content: I have owned a previous Kindle and the Sony. Without question this Kindle Fire is easier to read, faster to download, and has become such a part of my life that I use my laptop and phone less. A must buy.
Reviews.Title: E Reader

Reviews.Author: reader
Reviews.Content: Got one for my mom and she really appreciates the new features, lighter weight, and the mayday button. Transition for the older model was great. Easy to set up.
Reviews.Title: Love it better than my ipad

Reviews.Author: joevas
Reviews.Content: Just recently got it and am setting it up. It is well thought out and, with Amazon's support, it works well for me. I love Silk, the browser, and there is so much available it was worth the money.
Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Author: Nicks Nuna
Reviews.Content: After talking to several people I decided on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the mayday button. I've used it twice and it was much easier (and personal) than "chatting" on line.LOVE IT, LOVE IT.....Thank you Amazon!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire or IPad?

Reviews.Author: robert lindenberger
Reviews.Content: got it for my other half for her anniversary an that's what she wanted. I made a good choice.when she is happy I am happy!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Title: bought for wife

Reviews.Author: C. Barnett
Reviews.Content: Everything about it surpasses the IPAD 4 I had before it!  Amazon beats Apple on all counts.  Love the HDX!
Reviews.Title: This is a must have!

Reviews.Author: tom eakle
Reviews.Content: Its greatExcellent graphics and soundVery light weightEase of use for the novice and plenty of help and great cameras
Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9

Reviews.Author: Zoe's mom
Reviews.Content: I use it daily .. wish there was a better help system. . And for crying out loud .. figure out an easier way to clean out the deleted emails !!! Yeesh .. other than that .. I'm on the go .. so it has replaced my laptop for 90% of my life right now .. so much easier to toss in my purse .. . and I toasted my iPad .. I want everything on the same operating system ... and I'm still getting into it's full potential..
Reviews.Title: handy .. fun .. convenient

Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX!!  I am somewhat "electronically challenged" and had no desire to own a tablet.  My husband wanted to buy me one for my birthday and I told him not to because I would probably never use it.  Then I saw an ad for the Kindle Fire HDX.  What sold me on it was the "help" feature.  Being able to get help 24/7 from a person who I can actually see on my screen as we are talking, to me, is absolutely fantastic.  (I kind of look at it like I have a helper living right inside my tablet:)).  I have already called for help several times and have waited no longer than maybe 10 or 15 seconds for someone to "show up" and they are always able to help me with whatever question I have.  So far, I have used my Kindle Fire HDX to surf the web and to play games.  I love browsing in the app store, too.  I have watched a couple of tv shows, too.  I plan to download some movies soon and also learn how to download and then listen to music.  I am having so much fun with my Kindle fire HDX!!  (The only complaint I have is that the battery does not last as long as I would like it to).
Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: D. Byrne
Reviews.Content: I also own a Google Nexus 7, and my wife owns a new I-pad. The screen on the HDX blows them both away. The silk browser is super fast, and the OS Fire 3.0 is amazingly fast. I researched tablets very carefully as I had a lot of issues with the Nexus and I-pad. I would HIGHLY recommend the HDX. Get the 8.9 if you take a lot of pictures or video or watch a lot of video. The 7.0 is a little tight. GREAT PRODUCT.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price, great screen.

Reviews.Author: GORDON GIRVIN
Reviews.Content: Very good display and very responsive. Sound is weak.Two big mistakes -  no widgets and no other browsers.Hoping for software upgrades.
Reviews.Title: Good not great.  Missed opportunity.

Reviews.Author: Claricei "the Truthseeker"
Reviews.Content: FAR surpasses the ipad.  Husband loves it-display is terrific. We will have to see how it holds up.  The Kindle Fire I bought him 2 years ago is USELESS now.  Some internal breakdown of charging port has left it unusable.  I hope the HDX lasts better
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Reisetante
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade from my previous Kindle HD Fire. The screen is bigger, the colors very brilliant, and best of all it has a rear facing camera in addition to the front facing camera on the older model. The Kindle Fire HDX is a very nice tablet with many useful functions - some of which I still have to discover.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Daisy Dingess
Reviews.Content: I got this kindle fire after using a regular kindle fire for a couple of years and was greatly rewarded with the speed and color and the sounds.The difference while playing games is like night and day. My grandkids want to use it now also instead.I still love my other kindle with all my books on it.It's so much easier to browse on the internet.I'm very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I ENJOY MY NEW KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9". I HAVE A BIGGER AREA TO VIEW WHEN I WATCH MOVIES OR READ A BOOK. PLUS I HAVE MANY NEW OFFERS TO CHOOSE FROM. STILL HAVEN'T FIGURED OUT ALL THE THINGS IT CAN DO.
Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Jeff Salleng
Reviews.Content: I have upgraded from the original Kindle Fire to the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and I couldn't be happier.  Everything about it is pure upgrade. The screen, the power, the performance, the everything.  This is what a tablet should be. Period. End of story. Make yourself happy and get one of these.
Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing!

Reviews.Author: William P. Stallsmith
Reviews.Content: 5 stars because the HDX works exactly as promised.  A non-expert who can read and listen intelligently can use and enjoy it.  If a buyer does not need some exotic app available only on another tablet, then the HDX is his or her cup of tech.  The interface between user and machine is intuitive for the most part.  I use mine to watch old TV shows and movies, and to research references.  My only complaint is with the Amazon marketers who have decided to hump a heavy, $70 case for this light-weight beauty, while it is relatively difficult to find and buy a less expensive and better-working alternative.  I think I found one, but have as yet to get delivery from Amazon.  Fie on you, Amazon.  But again, thanks for offering the HDX.  This is my 3rd Kindle: the other 2 are the original ereader and a Paperwhite.
Reviews.Title: Easy choice for me

Reviews.Author: Shanahan
Reviews.Content: This meets all my expectations and more. My laptop will sit and collect dust now don't need it anymore . Wow
Reviews.Title: Better than I expected

Reviews.Author: Kyle D.
Reviews.Content: I am a Kindle addict, having owned every Fire model, and one before that.  The display of the 8.9 is unbelievably clear, even when compared to the 7inch model.  The sound is incredible and has a great range in volume.  I hope Amazon comes out with more Amazon software so it is possible to watch flash videos.  This range of products is still in it's infancy, and will only improve.  I believe that this is better than the IPad in many ways, price especially and soon will have more options than all competition.  Amazon has the best customer service and mayday is proof of this.  You will have zero regrets about buying this product
Reviews.Title: By far the greatest Kindle to date.

Reviews.Author: Maartje Heitlager
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle. Had a Asus window8.  I'm glad I changed to a kindle much easier for me to use.
Reviews.Title: my Kindle fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Claire.N
Reviews.Content: For 2 years I've been looking at readers & tablets, following reviews. Grabbed an inexpensive reader that I was doing fine with until I figured I was ready to take the "plunge". Absolutely overjoyed that I did (and so is my 8 yr old grandson LOL).Big enough but not too big. I went for the largest amount of gigs because I know myself. Love the sound, love the display, not a thing I don't love about it. Battery holds up real well. I'm often amazed at how long it goes before needing to be charged considering all the game playing, web surfing, email checking, etc that goes on.One of the main deciding factors was the availablility of the Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard Case that I'll review separately.
Reviews.Title: Finally

Reviews.Author: RosieQ
Reviews.Content: As a Kindle Fan, this is exactly what was advertised and expected.Having a previous version I must admit it took a couple days to get used to the new image of icons, which are more squared rather than the previous version in which they were rounded, but its an evolution.I loved the fact that is lighter, and the positioning of the on/off, and volume buttons is way better.A great evolution compared to the previous FIre HD
Reviews.Title: What I was expecting

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: While I would like to have access to the Google Play Store, I really love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I have sideloaded many of the apps I use that are not available on Amazon.  The one I had to have is Dropbox which works perfectly on the Kindle.  The display is the best I've seen on any tablet.  I used a Galaxy Note 8.0 prior to getting the Kindle Fire HDX and am very happy with the trade.  The only thing that would make it better is to have more of the Android apps available in the Amazon App Store.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!

Reviews.Author: K. Bohl
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with the kindle 8.9 . This is my second kindle from Amazon and both have exceeded my expectations.
Reviews.Title: kindle 8.9

Reviews.Author: Gary G. Gilmore "JJ48Fan"
Reviews.Content: I spend 6-8 hours on a computer every day. I work from home and have a desktop & a laptop going at the same time in my office and another laptop in the family room. I didn't think I would ever like a computer without a regular keyboard. I have an iPhone and those who know me would tell you my text messages are very short. I have big fingers and I just can't do what I see many teen agers do when it come to texting. I think many of them can text faster than they can talk. Anyway. this is much easier to use for responding to email and such. But that is NOT the only thing that I like about it. I love being able to get my Prime movies and TV shows on this. I am hard of hearing and wear hearing aids. I use close captioning on my TV. I used to have Netflix, but when they went to the streaming they didn't have closed captioning. I let them know my need and they said they were working on it, but it was never available for anything I wanted to watch, so I cancelled. It has been hard for me to use the Amazon Prime Movie downloads on my TV. I have to run it through my laptop into my TV and Prime downloads didn't show closed captioning. So I was delightfully surprised that everything I have been watching on my Kindle from Amazon Prime has closed captioning! I like the larger screen and the picture is amazingly clear, crisp, with great colors. I keep finding new useful apps to download. The battery seems to last a long time. I know it lasts a lot longer than my iPhone. This thing is very light in my opinion, but it is my first pad computer so I don't have anything to compare it to. I have come to prefer taking it to client meetings over my laptop. There are probably others more geeky than me that might want some things that the Kindle doesn't have, but I love mine just the way it is.
Reviews.Title: Loving my first table!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had the 32gb initially and had to upgrade to the 64gb.  I have mine loaded with comics and a various episodes from Amazon Prime Videos.  I miss the ability to hook up a HDMI cable to the TV as the HD series had at launch.  I do enjoy having the upgraded screen density, It comes in handy when reading tiny font on comic books.  The speakers could be a little better..mainly louder.  The sound quality is good, just not loud enough.  The size is perfect.  I tend to lean towards 7" tablets, but this is still in that realm of small tablets.  It's not a gigantic iPad nor a small Nexus 7, but a perfect blend of the two with it's own unique twists.  I'm on board the Amazon train.  I may not agree with the way they design all their products, but I accept it and love it.
Reviews.Title: 64gb is the way to go!

Reviews.Author: David W Anderson
Reviews.Content: Have owned the tablet for a few days now and so far it has been a joy to use. Super light, crystal clear video make reading, whether a book or just perusing the web, easy on the eyes. The sound is super as well. I've used other tablets and I'm convinced that the Kindle Fire HDX was the perfect choice for our family.
Reviews.Title: The perfect tablet?

Reviews.Author: Ed C.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase of the Kindle Fire. I also own a I pad and was discouraged from buying the Kindle because I was told that the Ipad was better. The mayday feature is amazing and I couldnt be happier with function. Amazon Prime is much better with the Kindle because of the fact that you can download free movies and tv shows. Since I purchased the Kindle I find myself only using my I pad for work.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire hdx 8.9

Reviews.Author: Carolyn Sprunger
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle.  I'll soon be 70 years old and I found this easy to use.  I especially like the "mayday" button.  The people that help are nice and patient.
Reviews.Title: My Kindle HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: wildroseorganics
