Reviews.Content: The sound is incredible, and the color on the screen, when I am watching a movie on Netflix is awesome. I love the size of the screen and the camera takes beautiful photos, even using the flash. It takes wonderful video footage, very clear. The mayday is just awesome, and all I have to do is touch it and I have live help. The customer service is wonderful, and you can see them, but they can't see you. They can see what is on your screen and help you with almost everything. I have my Bitstrips, and my instagram, but on the Kindle it is called Padgram, but works in conjunction with the instagram. I just signed up with  Statigr.am, which is similar to instagram. The games are so much more fun on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, my favorite is Subway Surfer. My grandson is in the Marines and stationed back in Missouri, and we play Subway surfer together.A little bit about 4G LTE, mine is through Verizon, and it was suppose to be $30.00 a month rather you use it or not. I got signed up with them and they pulled the 30.00 out of my account, 2 weeks later I received a bill from them for a whopping $175.00, with no mention of the 30.00 I already paid, with a bunch of BOGUS TRUMPED UP FEES, so be Leary.Most of the games are about extracting money out of your bank account, but there are some good ones you can play without having to pay more money.If you are a previous Kindle owner, all your games and information is transferred to your new Kindle, and you will find them on the cloud. You will just have to click on the cloud, and then click on what you want and it will download it right onto your new Kindle. It downloaded all my games, apps, and my book purchases, so you don't have to re-purchase them. I use my pinterest a lot on my new Kindle. I have 5 different emails, for various reasons, and thru the Kindle I have all of my email accounts at my fingertips.I forked out over a thousand dollars for the Ipad, and I was not impressed, and it is not ADHD FRIENDLY. The photos and video were o.k, but no flash. The sound doesn't even compare with the Kindle. I originally bought it so I could talk to my grandson through Facetime, but when I started comparing the difference between the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and the Ipad, the Kindle won hands down. So I returned the Ipad and bought my Kindle HDX for 600.00, and I am so very glad I did. Now, I talk to my grandson on the phone and thru Facebook and it works for us. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Author: Matthew G. Iannacone "MatthewGavin"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  Everything I need a tablet for, I can do on my Kindle.  I feel most people buy an iPad because that is what everybody else has or that is the only tablet they know.  If they took at a Kindle HDX they would know the Kindle does everything an iPad does for a CHEAPER price.  I read my books, watch movies on Netflix and Amazon Prime, use Flipboard.  I love that the calendar syncs with my Nokia Lumia 920.  I stream music using the new Jambox Mini when I have people over.  I am very happy with my purchase.
Reviews.Title: Who needs an iPad when you could buy a Kindle?

Reviews.Author: Donald C Hudson
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought and then issued to students in a paramedic class for use of all online learning resources and etextbook. It has met expectations. My only grip is that it does not support Goolge services. I understand the different competing manufactures, but great products from both can actually support each other and bolster sales on both sides!!
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: LesterT
Reviews.Content: I previously had a Samsung 10" table that was getting a bit long in the tooth.  I decided that the Kindle's size and clarity were to my liking, so I purchased one.  Interestingly enough - and I don't know if this special is still available - I got a good discount by purchasing it through AARP.That said, I don't have too many gripes about this product.  It's fast, easy to use, and makes reading novels (my primary desire for getting free novels through Amazon Prime) enjoyable.  My one big gripe is the Kindle app store. As a now retired techie, I like the ability to pick and choose which apps I want to use. The Kindle App store prefers to limit those choices by a wide margin compared to Android's play store.That said, I gave the Kindle four stars even though I believe it's a five star product. The Kindle App store issue, in my opinion, is not a minor grievance.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" tablet

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX. Wish I had purchased it sooner. Very easy to use. I hardly use my lap top anymore
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Claiomh
Reviews.Content: The only two problems I have with this is that I can't get flash player for it, and, since I got the ad free version, I would like to put my own pics up as my screensaver. Those are the ONLY two misgivings about my hdx. Otherwise, I love my hdx
Reviews.Title: phenomenal

Reviews.Author: 4realguy Beaumont, Tx
Reviews.Content: I really love this product, i have desktops and laptops but the device is versatile enough to carry any where and it can do just as much and keep you entertained on the go.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Berr Breiding
Reviews.Content: The versatility and graphics have us hooked.  Keep up the very, good work, and we 'll keep enjoying the apps.
Reviews.Title: GREAT

Reviews.Author: Sharon Schilling
Reviews.Content: I already have an iPad and I had to share with my husband so I decided to invest in another "tablet."  Im so glad I bought this.  I love the HD screen and at 32GB it has plenty of memory for me.  I love the size of it and it is  compatible with my other Kindle accounts.  I love that it came ready to go (with the exception of adding my personal email account) right out of the box!  Fully charged and my Kindle account/Amazon stuff was already synced with it the moment I turned it on!!!  Fantastic!
Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i  havn't had this unit very long. At first is was a little disappointed because I couldn't get an old black and white movie to play on it but I found the right app to do this, so so-far-so-good. I was initially concerned it was going to be too big to carry around, but it really isn't. Like they say in the ads, it is very light and has a great screen.  I would recommend to anyone gettingt a Kindle to max out the memory.  The 4G LTE has also proved handy when I was out of range of my wi-fi signal at a friends house; I was able to show them how I could download a book and do other shopping.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" WI-FI and 4G LTE, 64 GB

Reviews.Author: Steven J Yetter
Reviews.Content: One of the few technology choices I have made in recent years that has met my expectations. The only issue I have is reading outside in bright light but I knew this was going to be an issue that is why I kept my Kindle DX. I would recommend the Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX to anyone who needs a good table and reader. I may even try to leverage my windows development skills on this platform.
Reviews.Title: Met my expectations in every way.

Reviews.Author: Mr. Dad
Reviews.Content: One word can sum this device up... FUN! Second to that I would say "time waster". But who doesn't know that going in? This tablet is phenomenal in its quality, entertainment, and is it fair to say usefulness?? Not a cheap investment, but much better price than Apple products. The biggest drawback is the apps; Amazon has it set to only work with their own rather than with other options like Google Play. Not sure why as that hinders people's fondness for the device. There are other ways around it, just not convenient. Great product and we're glad we got it.
Reviews.Title: What did we do with our time before this?

Reviews.Author: Jessiebear
Reviews.Content: Great product! Light and easy to use. The screen is just the right size for travel and I love the ease of use. I just got an orgami case for it. I can even watch movies on it. Awesome and kudos.
Reviews.Title: Newest Kindle

Reviews.Author: angelina aynes
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle.  I love everything about it so far.  It is so much better for viewing pictures and videos.I love reading books on it.  I can change the font size so I don't have to wear my glasses to read.  I also love that it is so much more comfortable to hold for reading and turning pages.  I find  out something  new I can do easier and better every day.  I just wish I had more free time to play with it.
Reviews.Title: Love it.

Reviews.Author: William Tiewater
Reviews.Content: I have used the different tablets out there, and I like this one the best, My wife uses this in her sunday school classes and is very easy to navigate from scriptures to class lessons.
Reviews.Title: very great product

Reviews.Author: Lynn oltmanns
Reviews.Content: What can I say??!! This is my 4th Kindle. (I keep upgrading everytime a new one comes out!) They just keep getting better and better. I love it!!
Reviews.Title: Kindle

Reviews.Author: Derek J. Cusworth "Derekjohnc"
Reviews.Content: This is easily a near perfect Tablet.  It has all the features normally required for ANY tablet for a casual user and is perfect as an entertainment and communications tablet.  The MAYDAY button is especially unique and ideal for anyone who ever has run into a question or problem or confusion with using a new device.  The MAYDAY system is flawless and fun to use.  The Kindle is light and easily portable and ideally designed for use.  While the iPad may be slightly bigger it is also heavier and has too much that the average user would never need.  The Kindle has everything AMAZON offers and with a Prime Membership makes this the perfect tablet.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Deb Wimberly
Reviews.Content: I am so happy that I got this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Tablet.  I researched for awhile before I decided this was the tablet for my needs.  It is so easy to use and I am having a lot of fun with it.  I would recommend this tablet for anyone that enjoys entertainment and social apps, and reading.  Still learning how to use all the functions but so far no problems.
Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE TABLET!

Reviews.Author: L Schantz
Reviews.Content: So far I love the kindle fire, takes excellent pictures and greAt to read. My only complaint is all the advertising on the games. Amazon does not have the 2.99 words with friends which gets rid of those.also I cannot get my local apps like I did on my iPad..
Reviews.Title: kindle hdx fire

Reviews.Author: Kelly A. Meegan
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire is a 5 Alarm I am very pleased with my new Kindle Fire and I would recommend over an Ipad especially if you use it primarily as an ereader.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is a 5 Alarm

Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOOOOOOOOVE!  We can find nothing negative about this device!!! Our entire family loves our kindles, the HDX much more so!
Reviews.Title: BEST KINDLE EVER

Reviews.Author: Nick Greene
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture qualityGreat layout and designOrganization of apps/books/music/etc is greatI would recommend to all of my friends and family!
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for everyone!

Reviews.Author: Damaris Velazquez
Reviews.Content: It's actually pretty cool. I'm able to do practically every thing that I'd do on a desk/lap top... I'm very happy with my kindle
Reviews.Title: my kindle

Reviews.Author: The Chosen Ones Cs
Reviews.Content: I would have given the HDX 8.9 5 stars except that there are a few little quirks that I have to get used to. For example, there is no way, that I've found, that will allow me to delete multiple emails at once. So I have to delete emails from my mailbox individually.On the positive side...this thing pretty much allows me to take care of my business the same as I would be able to on my laptop. Not to mention, I can read books without having to maintain a paper bookmark...lol. I am even able to participate in online conference calls, which is awesome.Oh, and one more good thing...for those of you that don't have the mobile phone upgrade on your Kindle, if you subscribe to Skype for $2.99 a month, you have a fully functional cell phone that calls Skype numbers and cell numbers and the call quality is very clear.
Reviews.Title: Very Handy

Reviews.Author: Judy Koffroth
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet to use for travel. It's lightweight, and has a lot of apps. It was highly recommended by the salesperson.I tried pairing it with my HOTSPOT for secure, online purchases, banking, etc. while traveling only to learn that the devices are not compatible. Had I known this before purchase, I'd have made another choice.
Reviews.Title: Disappointment

Reviews.Author: Kestrel Hess
Reviews.Content: One would think this should work very much like an Android phone and in many cases it does.  It lacks the support for many of the apps, however, and struggles to be as productive as the iPad for only $100 less.  It sits in between the productivity of the Windows Tablets and the iPads but seems priced more as the more productive Apple.  If you are using just Amazon, great.  It doesn't have Chrome support or any other browser, which has its drawbacks.  Most of the games you enjoy on your phone either need to be re-purchased (inexplicably) or simply aren't supported.  The touch is pretty good though it sometimes runs a bit slow.  It is better than my Windows Venue 8 Pro but less well than the iPad Air (or any of the previous iPads).  Decent device but you might want to save for the iPad which does nearly everything just a little bit better.
Reviews.Title: Nice device and cheaper than Apple...but

Reviews.Author: WAB
Reviews.Content: The Fire HDX (mine 64GB, 8.9") is a superb tablet. My first was stolen, and I had no hesitation in choosing the identical unit to replace it. My only suggestion would involve the motion (rotation) sensor. It is far too sensitive. Only the slightest inadvertent rotation will change the portrait/landscape orientation. This was evident in both my units. Live Tech support could only suggest locking in the desired orientation (Options menu). As the Kindle Fire line did not exhibit this behavior, I must assume this was a less than optimal design decision, which hopefully can be corrected in a future software release. That said, everything else is state-of-the-art. Highly recommended!
Reviews.Title: Almost perfect

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle for about a month or so. Previously had Ipad which I left in an airplane. This device has much better screen as well as Wi-Fi speed which is really fast. 4G works well also. I like the navigation actually a bit better than the Ipad. Device also very compact.Downside-Not as broad a selection of aps-I haven't found a good navigation app yet-maybe someone has?Would like to see a keyboard that would be fit for this, as had one with Ipad that I liked.I would buy this one again due to compactness and escape from Apple restrictions.
Reviews.Title: Good tablet

Reviews.Author: Charles Ravenscraft
Reviews.Content: Great computer to take on the go.  You can easily download books from Kindle surf the internet, read emails, and watch videos on the Kindle Fire HDX with a great 8.9" screen.  Some what of a learning curve for someone that has not had a tablet before using touch screen, but not that hard to figure out.  Uses Wi-Fi or my cell phone provider which makes it easy to use anywhere.
Reviews.Title: Assume Tablet

Reviews.Author: Samantha J. Secor
Reviews.Content: The HDX Fire 8.9 is awesome!  The screen is so amazingly clear. The device itself is easy to use and it has all the capabilites you would find in a laptop - email, camera, internet, etc!
Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle!

Reviews.Author: Tsung Dow Huang
Reviews.Content: It is much lighter than IPAD2, a good screen good for my eyes and almost as good as the Kindle paperwhite I have too, I am more and more reply on this new device to do most of my work, e-mail, facebook, reading my collections... I think I make a good investment.
Reviews.Title: light, good screen, fast processor. Also good for reading, I can replace the kindle paperwhite most the time.

Reviews.Author: QueenV
Reviews.Content: Gift for my Mom and she loves it. We went with this rather than the iPad because it had a great front and rear camera and the iPad camera has lousy resolution and she's single and it came with the live help. Well she had to call several times during setup because mayday help focuses on navigation. Amazon really needs to change that and beef up this potentially very cool edge to their product. Mom is enjoying and has her email setup and surfs regularly on it, takes photos, and reads.
Reviews.Title: Great gift...mayday could be better

Reviews.Author: Lawrence A. Lang
Reviews.Content: GREAT GADGET FOR READING - - AND, IT DOES E-MAIL, GAMES GALORE, ETC.,  ETC.and, YOU CAN READ OUTSIDE ON SUNNY DAYS.
Reviews.Title: GREAT GADGET FOR READING AND .email... AND....games AND ....

Reviews.Author: Sandi
Reviews.Content: I really love my kindle. It's more portable than a laptop. I can do a lot in more place with less baggage.
Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Connie George
Reviews.Content: I really like the dual mode camera option. I'm having problems viewing some videos and have not attempted the flash player download.
Reviews.Title: Camera

Reviews.Author: The Soldier's Wife
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle and I love it. I don't have a negative thing to say about it. It travels with me everywhere for whenever I get a minute or two of downtime. Very pleased with this purchase!
Reviews.Title: I love it!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great device.  I have one problem that hasn't been solved.  I can't get my email contacts imported.  I've talked to 3 kindle associates but they haven't been able to help.  I also have a kindle 1 and the contacts imported when I signest up my e-mail account.  Other than that, it is very user friendly.  Books download easily.  Only had it a few months but the larger screen is so much better, and clearer than the kindle 1
Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Author: Kay McMann
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX to have a better way to read books and magazines than what my old Kindle has offered. I find I am using it for much, much more. All of my old Kindle books and back-issues of magazines were automatically available. The picture quality is great, making everything easier to read. As a bonus, I can now fall asleep reading and not have to turn off the bedroom lights; I just read in the dark, and let the Kindle turn off.I also download a couple of free games, one of which I really enjoy. And I have gotten hooked on watching old TV episodes that are free with Amazon Prime.The only real complaint I have is that I often have to disconnect/reconnect my WiFi; however, I believe this to be an issue with my internet, and not with the device.I definitely do not regret the purchase.
Reviews.Title: Almost perfect

Reviews.Author: T. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Used primarily as a e-reader. Love the size; # of screen pixels; view choices for reading (sideways, two column, screen brightness). Not too crazy about the ability to switch from reading to home. It usually takes me several attempts to find my icon. The browser is less than I expected for internet. I'd give it a 4.5.
Reviews.Title: MANY, MANY Features

Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my Kindle Fire. Very simple to download apps. Also it has Mayday if you need help. A real person talks you through how to install or fix problem. It is nice to take along with you it is very light weight.It takes great pictures and you can send to email or face book. It does lots of of other things..I give it a "Thumbs UP".. Jane
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hayes
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to all Android lovers! I love this tablet. It is easy to use and if I need help there is the Mayday button with reps who are always ready to help. I have found all the games I like to play. I have purchased and borrowed books, which is a feature of an Amazon Prime customer, and it all works smoothly.
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: switchking
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle HD got for my birthday February 2013. I saw the Kindle HDX 8.9 on a commercial,and what got me was that it was lighter to hold , as I read outside in the summer .I thought this newer version would work well. The picture quality is outstanding!! I am Very happy with my purchase.Looking forward to summer time reading!!
Reviews.Title: great!!

Reviews.Author: Mark Koditek
Reviews.Content: DOES EVERYTHING i WANTED IT FOR.Light as a feather and fast as a cheetah.Screen is easy to read and its intuitive.
Reviews.Title: LIGHT AND BRIGHT

Reviews.Author: Vicci Varner "VicciV"
Reviews.Content: I never could get into the whole tablet mania.  They were nearly as heavy as my laptop and the screens made my eyes hurt.  I had a Kindle paper white for reading and thought that would be enough.  But, after someone recommended that I check out the new Kindle Fire HD, my wishes came true.  It's easy to carry, has a sharp, sharp screen that I can read on without getting a headache, and a fast response time.  I love my Kindle Fire and I hope everyone can have one so nice.
Reviews.Title: Wonderful!

Reviews.Author: vangie potter
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX. Its my second one. They were both gifts to me for christmas. The first one was the kindle fire and I just used it mostly for reading and internet. The HDX I use for everything and it takes picture and video. The price is less than the IPAD and does the same things. Its also a good size. I ordered a case for it and when it arrived it was not the right one. I realized I ordered the case for the kindle fire HD and not the HDX so when you order a case make sure you order for the right one that you purchase. I just kept it because it would cost more money in shipping to return. I'll make it work.
Reviews.Title: I really like my kindle fire HDX

Reviews.Author: William Murray Jr.
Reviews.Content: The new HDX 8.9 is a huge improvement over the original Kindle Fire.  It run better than most laptops and navigation from one site to another is easy.  The display is just like watching a expensive TV.
Reviews.Title: Best so far

Reviews.Author: Inez
Reviews.Content: What can I say, this Kindle is fantastic.  This was a Christmas present to myself and I'm still exploring all the apps am trying to find my around this wonderful pad.  I tell all my friends to get one and they would not be sorry.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Charles R. Scheidt
Reviews.Content: I had a Nexus 7 and was very happy with it, but I also belong to Prime and weighed buying the HDX.  After several days of debating I decided to give the Nexus 7 to my wife who is not real into electronics.  At this time I couldn't be happier.  This tablet let's me get into a late night movie without bothering anyone and I think the features are fantastic.  Think I made a really good decision and would do it again.
Reviews.Title: On Fire!!!!

Reviews.Author: Kim Schubert
Reviews.Content: I had an older Kindle and I could watch movies (with a cable) on my tv.  Now with the new Kindle Fire HDX you have to have a special tv that will connect remotely with it.  Like how many people have that specific type of tv??  Very annoyed with that (new) option.  Other than that I love it.
Reviews.Title: special tv required to watch movies from your Kindle

Reviews.Author: Alice L
Reviews.Content: First time dealing with Amazon without any problems.My wife try the nook and did not like it. The first timeshe used the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" display she fell inlove with it.Alice
Reviews.Title: VERY PLEAESED

Reviews.Author: Alison Stoll
Reviews.Content: I love that I can read my favorite books and check my email.  Now I can use this wonderful amazing Kindle and not haul around my heavy laptop.  It is amazing.  I can connect to internet any time.
Reviews.Title: Christmas from Husband!

Reviews.Author: tom harper
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the HDX 8.9; its many advanced features are certain to please most new or current tablet users.  Found that purchasing a User's Guide on the product to be quite helpful in navigating its features.  I was introducted to this product by a friend and was immediately taken in by it, which led to my purchase.  Thanks for creating it!Tom
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Super!

Reviews.Author: Karla Biteman
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle for my birthday a month ago and I love it! I recommend this product to anyone looking for a tablet.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9

Reviews.Author: james robert horvath
Reviews.Content: It's the best tablet out there u get what u pay for. The only downfall is you can're watch flash on it
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9

Reviews.Author: Patricia Maierson
Reviews.Content: I received this for Christmas and I have enjoyed it so much.  It is easily navigated and it serves my purpose well.  As soon as I catch up on my backlog of books here at home I will be using it to access the library on Amazon and reading more!Definitely recommend to anyone!  Even though I am still learning its' uses.
Reviews.Title: Best Present EVER!

Reviews.Author: heidz
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX. I take it with me everywhere I go. If I had to give a criticism it would be the tipping trends to put spaces in between letters if I  don't watch. Not a biggie.
Reviews.Title: loooove it!!!

Reviews.Author: Bob Kesler
Reviews.Content: First tablet I have owned. Light weight, fun to use, great display and I really, really like the Mayday button.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price.

Reviews.Author: BONNY LOGELIN
Reviews.Content: Love it simply love it!  I enjoy my books and games that I play on it its so handy and convenient!  My email and facebook are so handy also.
Reviews.Title: Great HD!!!

Reviews.Author: Frederick V. Vehorn
Reviews.Content: A great device,  HD is perfect. Fast processor.  Easy to navigate and use.  battery life is excellent. All round, first class, tablet.
Reviews.Title: Love My 8.9" HDX!!

Reviews.Author: Monarch
Reviews.Content: AM one with limited knowledge at 70 yrs of age and found Amazon Help /Chatline is awesome.They are very courteous and patient.They also respond to every purchase made quickly.
Reviews.Title: wonderful gift. Kindle Fire HD X8.9,HDX

Reviews.Author: Winifred S Ansay
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this as my best Christmas gift ever from my husband and children.  I am slowly learning the ins and outs and free books as well as best sellers and magazines.  My birthday is coming and I want to get a cover for it!
Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift from my family!!

Reviews.Author: Roxanne L. Kemper
Reviews.Content: I have had more fun with this tablet!  Actually, I'm spending way too much time on it.  Love all the free apps!
Reviews.Title: Addictive

Reviews.Author: Patrick J. Schneider "MN_PatS"
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a Kindle Fire HD 8.9" about 12 months ago and was relatively happy with no intention of replacing it.  I decided to take advantage of an offer from Amazon for a 30 day trial period of the new HDX version and I was pleasantly surprised, no I was wowed, with what I've experienced.  To say the processor is fast is an understatement...they should require a pilot's license to run it because it flies.  The graphics are outstanding and the May day help feature really works although I've had only a couple of occasions where I've used it.  I've experienced no lag in responsiveness whatsoever and I'm happy...happy...happy.  I knew I wouldn't be returning it by the end of my first day using it and my only downside is now I have to say goodbye to my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9".
Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Tablet has set a new standard for performance...How do you spell homerun!

Reviews.Author: Bill Byrum
Reviews.Content: This product is a solid five PLUS Stars in my opinion.I am a Prime member and use my Kindle for multiple reasons including VERY reasonably ($) rented school textbooks, books of interest, free game applications like Candy Crush, and the amazing selection of free movies.The HDX config allows a 30 day time limit of downloadable movies for use for 30 days when I am out of wireless range.Superb real-time assistance is available via the MayDay button feature, so it is a great product even for those with minimal computer use skills.The display quality is far in advance of what can be found on competing tablets.Also I suggest everyone with a Fire visit the site kindlebuffet.com every day to see many free books and one free Fire application per day.
Reviews.Title: The 8.9 HDX - 64 GB - WiFi + Prime Membership

Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: In love the new Kindle HDX  8.9".  In have the Kindle HDX and this is much thinner and goes everywhere with me.  In especially love the camera and ease for posting pictures on facebook as I do not have a smart phone.
Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle

Reviews.Author: Joyce H. Edwards "gramma25"
Reviews.Content: This my 3rd Kindle - Kindle, Kindle Fire (1st release), Kindle Fire HDX.  I like the size (8.9") and storage (64 GB).  It holds a fantastic amount of books and apps and still responds quickly.  The size is great for reading and viewing videos.  I have Amazon Prime so I occasionally watch TV shows and movies on it but mainly use it for reading.  It was so much cheaper than getting  an Ipad and I can do anything with it that I could do on an Ipad
Reviews.Title: An awesome tablet!

Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the screen is amazing. So far, I'm enjoying the fire hdx.However, I wish the pages of books flipped as they do on the Kindle app for the ipad.Will follow up with other opinions as I become more familiar with device.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for watching movies

Reviews.Author: moshe abramovitz
Reviews.Content: Like the size.  Have not read any books on it yet.  Seems to work well.  Would be nice if it came without advertising without paying more.
Reviews.Title: HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: DONNA j hALL
Reviews.Content: this is my first kindle I love to read and play games and the help button talked me thru a lot of questions about the kindle
Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Author: Calvin Weaver "Cal Weaver"
Reviews.Content: This is a great purchase! I'm retired and even take it vice a laptop when I travel. As long as I can find a wireless network I'm good to go for email, books, movies, internet etc....Ease of operation and the Mayday feature really enhance this product. Would and have recommended it highly to others. Price is so much better than other tablets with similar features. Love this one.
Reviews.Title: Wow!

Reviews.Author: Nikki Magnusson "Nikki Magnusson"
Reviews.Content: i read all the reviews over and over..on all the sites..decided to try this kindle fire hdx..love love love it!!..no problems at all...does everything i want and more..the only way to get this from me is to pry it out of my dead fingers..i plan to be buried with this kindle..just in case the after-life has internet..
Reviews.Title: omg..big love!!

Reviews.Author: Alaska Gold
Reviews.Content: I find this a great product and the display is without question the best in the business well worth the price
Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from my first edition Fire

Reviews.Author: R. Harding "Golfer"
Reviews.Content: I'm quite a novice, but the more I learn and become more comfortable with it, the more I love it.  Everything is so crystal clear. Even used the "help" application and found it very helpful.
Reviews.Title: Kindl Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Dean C, Skaggs
Reviews.Content: I have talked myself into and out of purchasing any kind of tablet for several years. I have been a kindle user for nearly 5 years and thought that if I went with a tablet that a Fire made a lot of sense, due to the ease of viewing my content on both devices. Reviews for past models have been something like "a nice tablet for the money, but somewhat lacking in features and content." The reviews I read for the new HDX impressed both reviewers and myself. Being a long term Kindle user Amazon offered a payment plan of 25% down and an additional 25% down payment every three months until paid in full. I figured that it was only going to cost me about $100 to take a look. I am really impressed with this and use it to check email, surf the web and stream videos daily using the Prime content. I am glad I waited for this tablet!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: mark tritschler
Reviews.Content: You really can't go wrong with this item. The special offers are really unobtrusive and actually hit the mark sometimes. If I was more interested in a pure tablet I might have bought something else, but I read a lot and this is my third Kindle. The only gripe I have is that there is a lack of browser apps as it seems that Amazon is trying to lock down Silk as the must use browser. But I do use this to pay bills and am able to print from it with 3rd party apps. Overall I am really happy with it!
Reviews.Title: Love my new kindle

Reviews.Author: Ann "Ann"
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect size for watching movies, and also for productivity. I have a blue tooth keyboard which works great with it. I use it mainly for email, browsing the web and Office Suite Pro7 to view documents, spreadsheets and presentation. It is great to take notes in a meeting. It does not have the full capability of a laptop but serves as a small light weight, basic function mini-computer.  The size and resolution of the screen is excellent for productivity tasks and reading books.  I have many reference books and bibles on my kindle. I even have a Sandisk 32GB wireless flash drive that works great with the kindle as well.  I upgraded from the Kindle fire 1st generation and even though it was a change, it was a positive change and I adjusted quickly.  It was easy enough to use that I have not taken advantage of the instant help yet. Great product.
Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle

Reviews.Author: theresa davidson
Reviews.Content: The nicest kindle I own. It is fast, very reliable, (with a long lasting battery), and the screen makes working on the internet very comfortable. I am very glad I made the investment. The 4G LTE allows me to continue working when WiFi is limited or not available.I definitely give It 5 stars.
Reviews.Title: KindleFire HDX

Reviews.Author: KaylaNanna
Reviews.Content: I've had the new kindle fire hdx for two months now and I love it.  I also own a first generation kindle fire.  My first kindle was bought because I love to read. As my eyesight deteriorates I find it easier to read larger print. One of the greatest things about a kindle, no matter which one you own, is you can carry all of your books with you. No worries about storage space. Moving? No shipping.The HDX? Lighter. Camera quality is very good. Game graphics, excellent. My favorite? Having the kindle read to me. Now I can crochet and read (ok listen) at the same time. I can also listen to a book while I'm cooking.Had my granddaughter our yesterday and decided to try the kindle FreeTime.  My granddaughter loves it. She wanted me to give her my old kindle. Now she wants my new one. Well she has a birthday soon. So who knows.
Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire, great

Reviews.Author: wolverine_girl
Reviews.Content: I like this product because it is a lot easier to use than a laptop (to me at least). Also, there are so many fun, new things to discover. I would recommend this for anyone!!
Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!

Reviews.Author: randy timbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted this for the larger display and the camera works really well. I am overall very happy with my new kindle and have had no issues moving into it. I also like having the internet available with this kindle.
Reviews.Title: Happy with my new kindle

Reviews.Author: Erickson
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen on this kindle and the ease of typing because the keyboard is bigger. Great product.
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Oran
Reviews.Content: Exotic product ... too difficult to use with FAT fingers.  Great battery life ... FOR NOW !  How much will the cost be to replace it, since no user access is available !! ??
Reviews.Title: Touch Screen BIZZ

Reviews.Author: Duane W Lundahl
Reviews.Content: Overall great. Light and fast. The device does leave out a pure web experienve since it is so tied to Amazaon but that's minor. My complaint is that the calendar app that is included can't be even used if you have your email account with AOL. That, it appears, is due to the fact that it is not written in a way to allow the calendar app to sync with AOL. I learned this by using the Mayday button and going through about three reps before one that understood the problem could explain it. He stated that you had to have certain email accounts (ie. Gmail, yahoo etc in order for the app to sync.) Why in the world would you write an app like that? He further stated that there were many other calendar apps availabe that did not need to sync with your email. Supposedly that's a satisfactory answer. I think not as it eludes the question of why did you write the software that way? Dumb!By the way, some have written this is an iPad killer. Not in my opinion and I have an iPad.
Reviews.Title: Great, but with a dumb calander app

Reviews.Author: yogatorrie
Reviews.Content: This device is a pleasure to use. It's slim and light weight. I kind of carry it everywhere when I'm home, (sort of like Linus with his blanket from the Snoopy comics). I am not an expert on tablet devices regarding pixels and resolution. I am an expert on what I like and what works for me. Some tech devices that so many of us have made a part of our every day lives make you feel as if you need to take a class at your local community college in order to utilize. Not so with this Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX.I have used the Mayday button feature and It works!The video on this device is beautiful. The screen size is so much better than the smaller screens if you enjoy watching TV shows or movies as much as I like to do.I'm a adult, working outside the home with a family and all that time constraints that come with that life. It's so nice to have my Kindle fire to give me choices when I get some "me time".I am a happy Amazon and Kindle user. I definitely recommend the Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX.
Reviews.Title: So Glad I Chose THe Fire 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Dplover
Reviews.Content: I really like the lightweight and size!!  The clarity of the screen is wonderful!! It's perfect for my needs. Ease of use is also a plus.
Reviews.Title: I love the weight, size and clarity!

Reviews.Author: Luisa H. Finau "Nursing student"
Reviews.Content: My 10 year old loves it! The graphics on the kindle r superb! It is easy to use and has kid friendly apps.
Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Author: Veniesta Gourdine-Jones "NETTIE"
Reviews.Content: I am on my 3rd Kindle so need I say more? I am and always be a Kindle lover , the ADDis so much lighter and love the instant help.
Reviews.Title: My Love

Reviews.Author: Musicman
Reviews.Content: Great!!! Nothing more needs to be said except for: should come with a case. The payment schedule was a huge help. Thanks
Reviews.Title: Fantastic

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "MrGourmet"
Reviews.Content: Didn't take me long to fall in love with this kindle.  The screen does have more glare that the kindle designed for books but it lasts amazingly long on a charge.  I joined Amazon prime and the movies look great that I watched.  The ability to change the text on this kindle for reading as well as the color; paper white, Tan or reverse(black background, white text is very nice.) When I read at night I change the background to the black and there is less light emitted to wake my wife.
Reviews.Title: Who needs a regular kindle when I can use this

Reviews.Author: Wendelin W. Dunado
Reviews.Content: Loving it carrying with me. Got a great cover with bluetooth keyboard!I've used the May day help once still have lots of features to learn.finally using for digital version of a subscription I have. Nothing I don't love about it yet.
Reviews.Title: terrific when i can slip it away from husband who gave it to ME!

Reviews.Author: Frank R.
Reviews.Content: This product has so far, exceeded my expectations. The display is awesome. The performance is outstanding. The only thing that has me worried is the battery life. The specs say that the battery life has been extended, that it "delivers an uncompromised 12 hours of reading, surfing the web on Wi-Fi, watching video, or listening to music. When you're just reading, Kindle Fire HDX automatically powers down unused system components, extending battery life to 18 hours."  I have found that that is NOT the case. The battery is a definte improvement over other models, but it does not even get close to the advertised specs.For the most part, I am very happy with this item.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: syoung
Reviews.Content: So I was pretty torn about buying this or the iPad mini.  So happy I bought the Kindle Fire HDX!!  I can do everything I want to on it.  Main thing I use it for is reading books and magazines, surfing the web, watching videos on Hulu+, and playing games.  I have absolutely no complaints about any thing.  I used to have the first generation Kindle Fire and this is by far better.  Better sound, clarity, and way lighter in weight.  It may not have the same or as many apps as Apple (yet) but I am not bothered with that since I have an iPhone.  It is everything I wanted in a tablet.  Very happy with my decision!
Reviews.Title: Love Love Love

Reviews.Author: Janell Freeman
Reviews.Content: This product is great for reading and checking my email. I'm still in the learning process so I'm sure I will find that it does a lot more than I can know.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I love all of the new features. If you are looking for an excellent e-reader, I highly recommend purchasing this Kindle!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful!

Reviews.Author: Beth Johnson
Reviews.Content: I received a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for Christmas. Love it. It is my third Kindle starting with the original which I still have and it still works really well. The 8.9 works really well for me since I read a great deal and like to play Spider Solitaire and Mahjong. I compared the Kindle Fire HDX to other tablets and found they did not give me all I wanted in a product. I am still finding new things all the time.
Reviews.Title: Love my 3rd KIndle!

Reviews.Author: hemant mistry
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need, and is easy to use. The best features for me are the screen and the lightness.The only flaw I find with it is the Silk browser that has limited functionality. Installed Firefox, and was able to sync my bookmarks with other devices, so I am happy now.
Reviews.Title: excellent tablet

Reviews.Author: J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This is the best of all your options for this type of tablet.  Combined with Amazon Prime and the available apps you can do just about anything!  Pictures/camera/web/videos/reading/printing/documents this exceeded my expectations.  Excellent price.
Reviews.Title: 4th Kindle

Reviews.Author: Carolyn S. Myers
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly and if I had questions, being able to chat with someone immediately is fantastic.  Walked me through exactly what I need to do.  Recommend to anyone wanting to purchase a tablet.
Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle

Reviews.Author: trini girl
Reviews.Content: Love it, expect i will have it for a very long time. Thanks to amazon payment plan i finally feel i have come into the 21st century. My friends & family  also love the fact they can see me on skype.thanks amazon.
Reviews.Title: NEW OWNER OF A KINDLE FIRE HDX

Reviews.Author: Stephen Champlin
Reviews.Content: Have used both products, and the HDX is hands down the better tablet!  I would reccomend this product to anyone interested in an awesome tablet.
Reviews.Title: Better than the Ipad

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the machine. I find it very easy once you know what to do. I am still learning about it. I brought books on it.The only thing I didn't like was not receiving an instruction book on it so I could read it first.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Dane P.
Reviews.Content: I was expecting far less. I am surprised. Easy set up out of the box charge it and go. Only problem is fighting with the family over who gets to use it, translation I will end up buying more.....
Reviews.Title: Easy to use and set up, LOVE it so far!

Reviews.Author: kyrhyne
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her HDX.  The only thing that would make it better would be supporting flash and expanding the app store.  Outside of those two things, it's an amazing tablet!
Reviews.Title: Best one yet

Reviews.Author: papagreg
Reviews.Content: I am blown away by the design and performance of this e-pad.  This is my second, bought the original Fire when it came out a couple years ago.  Looks and feels great, software works fine, quick response for the few things I have used it for so far.  Amazon was also quick to ship and made adjustment to order when I asked for it.  Don't know much about electronics, but I know right now that this will be used 90% of the time for all my web surfing, email reading, taking on vacation, reading books and downloading movies to watch on the road.  Great reader also.  Battery life is good.  Setup is a breeze.  Wireless works great.  Don't know anything about gaming capabilities, look to other reviewers for that.  Pay the $79 per year to become a Prime member to realize the greatest advantages of this unit. The quality of this build is on a par with and maybe better than that red tree fruit that grows in Washington state.  I see some reviews griping about being tied to Amazon, but for my use and needs, that is a plus rather than a minus.  Could go on with praises, but you get the idea.  If you are on the fence and are an average tablet user, get it now.  If you have kids or are clumsy dropping things a lot, get the protective case, otherwise the cheap cover pad will be sufficient.
Reviews.Title: Fire 8.9 HDX

Reviews.Author: Jean A Swinehart
Reviews.Content: I was so ready to purchase the Kindle Fire HDX but I waited till the reviews were better.  And I am glad I did.  It works great.  No strange halo on the edges, it charges to 100%.  Holds a charge great.  Streaming off of Amazon Prime is very smooth.  Smoother than off my laptop.  Surfing the net is very quick.  There is so much I can do with it and I haven't even figured it all out yet.  The only thing that needs to be different is the speaker setup needs to be on the front of the Fire instead of on the back.  Camera works great.  Will post more once I have learned more about my new gadget.
Reviews.Title: A great gadget.

Reviews.Author: Sugan
Reviews.Content: like: lightest kindle ever for its high speed and resolution and easy to read for long periods of time.don't like: unaffordable and very limited covers available for the HDX. still waiting for the price drops so have to keep it away from the kids.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB

Reviews.Author: Sandy Ganz
Reviews.Content: I have the old 8.9" Kindle and was excited the improvements to the new Kindle. It's great! Display is razor sharp, audio is good and so far battery life is excellent. Not sure what else to say but this is a great pad, and a nice improvement in speed vs. the first one.Sandy
Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!

Reviews.Author: Andrew D. Farrand
Reviews.Content: The access to on-line-live help is fabulous.  This is a full-featured  table I can use with ease.  And I like to support amazon.com  when I can and as I have been for years.
Reviews.Title: fabulous tablet

Reviews.Author: Beverly
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle Fire and wanted to upgrade to a new one. I also wanted a tablet and thought I would give this new Fire a chance.I bought the Kindle Fire HX 8.9. I am retired and my eyes are not what they used to be. I have the Kindle Paperwhite and I read my books on the paperwhite. I am using this new Fire to check and write emails, shop on Ebay, listen to music, play Candy Crush, and the best part is I can plug it into my car radio and it will read to me.The Fire keeps my place as I am reading my Paperwhite. that works out great for me because I can switch between the two any time I want to. I love to listen to Pandora while I am reading in bed so I have them both going usually at the same time.The only set up problem I had was hooking up to my wireless. I called AT&T;, my wireless provider, and they gave me a tech supporrt number to call. I called and found out it was Amazon Tech Support. I was hooked up to my wireless in less than a minute of them answering the phone. I was so thrilled with both their support and treatment. They were very nice and had me up and running in no time.I am new to this Kindle Fire 8.9 but I have to tell you, I really like it and I would highly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture

Reviews.Author: Brian A. Sanders
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. Got it for myself and wife as a Christmas present and its hard to put down. App store still needs some work, and there are apps that are free in the Google Playstore that are not here, but overall they have most of the Apps I use anyway. The quality of the screen is incredible. Awesome for movies and TV shows, games, entertainment, etc. It is also great for productivity, and will be even better once that App store opens up a bit and we can get some better productivity Apps as well. Overall though, I am extremely happy with this purchase. I was a Prime member before and utilized the Amazon MP3 and cloud storage so all my music was there as well, which could leave my experience a little more biased toward this tablet as opposed to an iPad per say.
Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet

Reviews.Author: baseballplayer
Reviews.Content: I've owned many android tablets, and was a little hesitant to get the HDX because of Amazon's tweaking of android to it's own operating system.  But a friend of mine got one and really liked it, and he owns about 15 tablets as well as develops roms for many of them.  So along with the offer to pay in installments, I decided to give it a try.First thing is the amazing light weight, and thinness.  It almost feels like it's going to break, it's so thin.  But it hasn't(yet :) ).  The power and volume buttons being on the rear take a little getting used to, but it feels pretty good once you use it a while.The screen, of course, is tremendous, with the high resolution.  And colors are very bright, as well.  In operation, the speed of the UI is quite good, I haven't really noticed any lag.  Apps load quickly, and games like Asphalt 8 and Modern Combat 4 play effortlessly.Not everything is perfect, of course.  Three things in particular i wish were different.  First, lack of an sd card slot is a con, although with the 32gb version I have, storage isn't a problem so far.  But if you had a lot of movies, normally you could play them off an sd card.  Of course Amazon wants you to use the cloud, but what about if you can't connect to wifi?  For me it's not a big deal but I can see it being so for some users.The second item is no HDMI out port.  Sure, it can use Miracast, but if you don't have a Miracast enabled tv, then you have to get an adapter, and they're not cheap.  This bothers me more than no sd card slot, but again, i have a couple other tablets with HDMI out, so not a deal breaker.Lastly, no Google Play store.  While I thought this would be really bad, the Amazon app store isn't totally lacking in good apps.  Also, you can enable adb, and sideload apps easily enough.  Unless an app needs to download additional content, everything pretty much will work.Overall I find myself satisfied with the device, it's super-fast, the screen is brilliant, and the UI is actually pretty good, with the carousel.  If you're already in the Amazon ecosystem, it's much easier to get more out of the tablet.  And nothing else can really touch it for performance at this price.
Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected

Reviews.Author: Michael Malloy
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! I wish I could have afforded the version with more internal storage. I have purchased many Kindle books already and I'm delighted to have such a library available in one lightweight and thin device. It's much better than the B&N; Nook I bought a year or two ago. It weighs almost half of what the Nook weighs. That alone is a major advantage. I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because the technical specifications are much more attractive than the similar iPad.I have used Amazon for several years. I find shopping on Amazon extremely easy. I only wish more of the books I like were available in Kindle format.I purchased a cover/stand from another manufacturer at a computer store. So far I'm happy with it and I got what I paid for. My Kindle is well protected and I can prop it in a comfortable position horizontally for reading and viewing.The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" also comes complete with TWO cameras. Granted the camera for taking pictures is pretty low on mega pixels but it makes good snapshots. I've never had a computer with a camera that allows me to communicate with anyone. The first time I used the "help" feature on the Kindle I was astonished. I had an immediate connection with someone who knew the product very well and helped me more than he knows.Watching videos on this device is very addictive. I love the perfect clarity and excellent sound.I wish I could use to Kindle to connect directly to my PC to move files into the Kindle. I can move files using the PC but the Kindle doesn't have a way to communicate with the PC.Perhaps in a next generation of Kindle a smart phone app will be included! I'd love to have one device that does everything.
Reviews.Title: Very impressive!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did lots of research before purchasing this unit.  It seems great for my daughter's use which will be mostly surfing the net, reading books, watching movies etc.  Since it doesn't seem to have full access to the google play apps and some of my work related apps are not silk compatible, it would not be the best choice for me.  But is was a great purchase for what is being used for.
Reviews.Title: happy with it

Reviews.Author: lureneh
Reviews.Content: These older eyes really enjoy the bigger screen and the high definition.  There was a problem with the speakers and they had to replace it, but the replacement came quickly and the return was free and effortless.
Reviews.Title: It's great

Reviews.Author: John "JSM"
Reviews.Content: Excellent display lightweight and fast and there's plenty of storage. Voice to text conversion works very well. I am doing this review with voice to text conversion. It does most of the functions you expect of the tablet very well and very fast. I use it every day.  Although excellent it is not perfect. Kindle needs to supply a file storage program so you can see where documents reside. Now we have to download an app to do that. There should be a delete key to delete text to the right of the cursor instead of only a backspace to delete to the left. I am tired of the browser telling me I have too many windows open. You can never have too many windows. I have not yet found a function that properly stores your favorite websites.  The Adobe reader tells me some of the PDFs that I download are not in proper PDF format.  Yet I can download them on my desktop and  email them and put them on my Kindle.  This is too much work around. Also Amazon needs to make its peace with Google so that you can use Chromecast easily. You can do it now but it's too much work around.
Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Packaged product arrived on promised date. Packaged very well. Was for me so was already registered and had all my content on it. This is my 4th Kindle and they just keep getting better. Highly recommend this product. Ease of use is great.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display and 4G LTE,16 GB

Reviews.Author: R. Perkins "MrPBob"
Reviews.Content: Excellent unit.  Much more bargain priced than the apple, etc.  Waited and waited for a special price and finally gave in.  Went on sale 3 days later.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Ryan Winningham
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect tablet. It does everything I need and more. It's super sleek and light. And paired with the leather origami case, it's perfect
Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing

Reviews.Author: K. Debevc "IKat2u2"
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love it.  highly recommend it.  Lot cheaper than the IPad and does everything the Ipad does and much cheaper to purchase.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 16 gb

Reviews.Author: Country Woman
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle Fire and I'm still as pleased and excited with it as I was with the first one.  I decided to go with the bigger 8.9" model this time and I love the extra viewing room, especially for movies.  My only complaint and it is a big one, is that some apps that work on the 7" aren't available for the larger screen.  I'm guessing they work on the Ipad, so why not this??
Reviews.Title: Just as I expected

Reviews.Author: Jerod D. Smith
Reviews.Content: The HDX has a awesome  picture , in the short time we have had it , it has worked quit well.
Reviews.Title: Awsome picture quilty!

Reviews.Author: heather wilhelm "wyogal"
Reviews.Content: the mayday is unbelievable!!  this is without a doubt one of the best tablets in the universe rite now!!! screen is beautiful.
Reviews.Title: revolutionary

Reviews.Author: LBC
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my purchase.  It was this or the ipad, but I'm glad I chose this unit over the more expensive one - for my use of movie watching, web surfing, and game playing it serves the purpose very well.  I have a reader as well and love it so I decided to go with a Kindle and I'm glad I did - nice products.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!

Reviews.Author: Ramon H. Pantoja "libros"
Reviews.Content: I've been using it for a few weeks now and I;m totally hooked.Definitely will keep it hopefully for a long time. Very quick access to my e-mails, calendar etc.It's becoming a necessary tool for my line of work.
Reviews.Title: Amazing effort to create a great product

Reviews.Author: Bubu
Reviews.Content: I had this product for less than 30 days, I enjoyed having it and using it for many fun stuffs. The best I noticed was the quality of images, that included videos, movies, pictures, and browsing the internet.The stereo sound is so good even better when I plugged in my earphones!
Reviews.Title: Excellent product, best image ever!

Reviews.Author: Carrie Campbell
Reviews.Content: My daughter saved for a long time so that she might upgrade her device (she has an old Kindle Fire). With the help of some Christmas money from parents and grandparents she was able to get this nice 8.9" Kindle Fire HDX. She struggled with the decision, however, and did a lot of comparison shopping. She looked at reviews of both the iPad Mini (comparable in price to this device) and this Kindle Fire. She had to get the 8.9 to get the camera on both sides, which she wanted and the iPad mini has. The iPad mini was winning in her estimation and research, but what made her choose the Kindle was that she'd already spent so much time and energy over the many years of owning the Kindle Fire, advancing in her games and purchasing coins. I asked Help if everything from her Kindle Fire would transfer to the new Kindle Fire HDX and they said yes and failed to note exceptions to this. After getting the new device there ARE exceptions to this and they include your standings in Apps you already own and your coins. What? The whole reason she chose the Kindle Fire over the iPad mini. Two things happened to help her NOT return the Kindle, the help desk was helpful and worked hard to make things "right" for her on the new Kindle and she really does like the "feel" of this new Kindle. The HDX is light, easy to hold and does not "accidentally" touch the screen when you are playing games, which is something she notices a lot on her friends iPad Mini. We have had one situation of a frozen screen and we will keep an eye on this over the next couple of weeks to see if it happens again. Hopefully, no. The Help desk is easily accessible, however, and responsive so if the screen freezes again we will hopefully get some help and be able to fix it rather than have to exchange the Kindle. In the end, the Kindle design and the Amazon support saved the day and has made my daughter very happy, and me too because I got her some nice accessories for Christmas to go with it!
Reviews.Title: Bumpy road but Amazon help got us there

Reviews.Author: Jacob Garcia
Reviews.Content: great look feel great apps great movies with amazon prime can not go wrong cheaper then an ipad mini and works better pick one up if you can
Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Author: Jim E. Stone
Reviews.Content: I still read my first kindle but when I can get a good leather cover for  my 8.9 I will use it alltogether
Reviews.Title: better than my first Kindle and I could'nt do without my first one

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just received it.  I am impressed with the service, the speed of response, and the bonu is talking to nice people who are very helful.
Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Jean Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  It's fantastic and I use it every day.  I highly recommend it to everyone.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic!

Reviews.Author: Crystal Peoples
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I am learning new things about it each day.  Since submitting my initial rating, I have no idea why my reasoning did not show up, but I have learned how to adjust text to speech voice speed.  The other issues I had were the inability to print web pages and the fact that the text to speech tends to stop at the beginning of a new chapter.  The volume is fine indoors but inside of a car, the road sounds tend to make it difficult to hear text to speech unless you have the device in your lap which is risky while driving.  In certain books, text to speech repeats the last word in a sentence.  This can be annoying.  I imagine I use text to speech more than the average person.  Other than my listed issues, I have no problem with the device.  I was told that Amazon is working on web printing and the text to speech new chapter stopping.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Redhot
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. So glad I chose this one. Lots of apps to pick from. Downloads are quick. Been easy to figure out everything.
Reviews.Title: Worth the money

Reviews.Author: Lloyd Malone
Reviews.Content: Beautiful screen; easy and intuitive to use; has everything I need; terrific customer service; connections to Amazon are very consumer friendly.Many of my friends have I-Pads...I think the HDX is much better and of course, less expensive.I am extremely pleased!
Reviews.Title: Exceeds my Expectations!

Reviews.Author: David Jacobo
Reviews.Content: It froze once within the first week of use. Other than that I think it's amazing. I can only hope that it won't freeze too often.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx headline

Reviews.Author: Win-Lin
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with ease of use and clarity of photos! I am learning quickly. This is my first tablet experience. I don't even have a Smart Phone! Great product!!
Reviews.Title: Highly recommend! Very easy to use - even for a beginner!!

Reviews.Author: S. W. Starnes
Reviews.Content: This Kindle does everything I need it to do: books, games, internet, mail, etc.  With my Amazon Prime membership, I can stream movies to my TV via a blue ray device.  It's fast.  It's clear.  I used the help feature to have someone help me sync my Kindle with my blue ray player.  Very cool.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX Fits My Needs

Reviews.Author: Mike W. Hoffman "hoff7273"
Reviews.Content: I use it mainly for watching movies on Netflix and managing my fantasy football teams.  I've been in and out of the hospital this year so it's nice to have something to watch movies on without lugging my $2000 laptop around.
Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Author: mgw
Reviews.Content: Upgraded my 1st generation kindle fire and what an improvement. Picture quality is fantastic and the Dolby speakers sound great.Silk web browser is fast and responsive. Light weight and nicely placed on and volume buttons. This is a great tablet that is sure to make you happy.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: nicholr gibson
Reviews.Content: I chose the kindle because there is so much that you can do besides reading books there are learning games for my son and I can also watch movies with my prime membership
Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX

Reviews.Author: dcbag
Reviews.Content: Wanted to be able to use with Fire TV but print was not bold or large enough to read, really liked being able to record prime and watch later, did not like not being able to use play store. Had to return, then purchased a 10" Sony tablet, really like it, but can't watch or record prime videos.
Reviews.Title: Really wanted to love

Reviews.Author: Bonnie L. Munn "Bonnie"
Reviews.Content: This one is the best of the lot.  I have found 16 GB more that sufficient to meet my needs and I use it everyday.  I especially like the size.  It is just right for watching movies, yet portable enough for my bag.  It has a great camera (front & rear facing).  I purchased it when it was 10% off and with my Amazon points and a gift card I paid (including tax) less that $300.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Jim King
Reviews.Content: I really like the quality of the picture on my new Kindle. I had the smaller version which I like, but the larger version just blows it out of the water. More than I expected!Once again the shipping was far better than I even imagined! Amazon never fails to impress me!
Reviews.Title: Outstanding!

Reviews.Author: Huntington Appraisal Service
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife who had an older style Kindle.  She absolutely love this Kindle Fire.  The screen color resolution is great and it is outstanding for reading books.
Reviews.Title: Really awesome!!

Reviews.Author: Gerald Vineyard
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX.  It's very easy to use.  The pictures are Crystal clear and the sound is wonderful.  M y older fire didn't have the ability to play flash content.  This one has an alternative viewer that fills that need.  My primary need was a reader.  This device surpasses all of my requirements in that category.  Reading on this is device is a joy.  I couldn't be happier.
Reviews.Title: great device.

Reviews.Author: ziegler
Reviews.Content: I really love this Kindle, I use it for reading, playing games and surfing the web. It does everything I need and more. I highly recommend it. I own 3 different kindles love all 3. And yes I use them all.
Reviews.Title: Love It.

Reviews.Author: Timothy B Bjornestad
Reviews.Content: I love amazon, and have been a Prime member for years. The HDX is a great deal in terms of content if you are already an Amazon prime member, and the quality of the screen is INCREDIBLE!However, I've found that many of the applications that I've loved on other platforms are not specifically adjusted to run well on this device. The touch parameters are off, the resolution is suspect, or the application simply won't work at all. Try THE GAME OF LIFE or Scribblenauts on it and you'll see what I'm talking about in a matter of minutes.THE ABSOLUTE WORST ASPECT OF ALL -- THE BROWSER!!! You are unquestionably limited to less than half of the I the internet because of scripting errors that arise when trying to load videos or simple page content. It is incredibly and outrageously frustrating. One last note, I wrote this using my KF HDX - please excuse any possible spelling errors.Great quality device, but until the browser is updated and applications are refined, I insist that you stick with your IPad.
Reviews.Title: Average at best.

Reviews.Author: book lover
Reviews.Content: I debated over whether to get a Kindle Fire HDX or an iPad Air, but after reading comparison reviews and considering the weight, the price value for 32 gigabytes, and screen resolution, I went for the KIndle. After spending several hours today playing with my new "toy', I'm convinced the Kindle is the right choice for me. The screen resolution is spectacular, battery life is great (even with WiFi on and the brightness set at around 80%), the sound the best of all the tablets I already owned, the ease of use, the lightning fast processing, the app choices, and the totally AWESOME Mayday feature (which I only needed to use once during the setup), all terrific! I just love it!
Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Author: Mary A. Jarrell
Reviews.Content: I WANTED ONE WHEN I SAW PEOPLE USING THEM EVERYWHERE.I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT IT.I ACTUALLY BOUGHT TWO.  MY HUSBAND HAS WANTED TO LEARN HOW TO USE A COMPUTER FOREVER AND HIS KINDLE IS THE PERFECT WAY TO LEARN THE CONCEPT.  HE IS HARD OF HEARING AND WITH EARPHONES HE IS HEARING EVERYTHING.  HE HAS BEEN GLUED TO IT WATCHING VIDEOS (1940'S AND 50'S) RADIO AND TELEVISION AND LISTENING TO MUSIC FROM THE 50'S AND 60'S. IN OTHERWORDS IT'S BEEN A GODSEND FOR HIM.  HE'S RESEARCHED INFORMATION HE HAS WANTED TO KNOW AND HE HAS READ MORE SINCE HE GOT IT THAN I SAW HIM READ IN THE LAST 44 YEARS.
Reviews.Title: THE PERFECT COMPANION FOR SENIOR CITIZENS

Reviews.Author: Frank Willett
Reviews.Content: I have had it for about a month and get frustrated every time I have used it. NO USER DOCUMENTATION.  I have a couple hundred books that I had nicely organized on my old Kindle.  Have tried a couple of times to organize them on the new one and failed miserably.  Talked to a "May Day" person who recommended a use's guide book which I purchased.  It was no help what so ever.  Told me how to use the Kindle with my computer, transfer movies to the TV for viewing, use the Kindle as a telephone, etc.  All I want from my Kindle is a device for storing and reading my books.  I am disappointed.  I do need all of the features this kindle has.  I already have cameras, smart phones, computers, an iPad, etc.  I liked the functionality of my old kindle better.  Perhaps if I ever figure out how to buy, read and store books on the new one I will start using it on a regular basis.
Reviews.Title: Tried to purchase a book and couldn't even do that!

Reviews.Author: Sylbasia "Sylvia"
Reviews.Content: There were many emails b/w me and CS Phylicia about the problem with my silk browser, and she said that she would let me know the results and solution. But she just ignored me.  After about 10 days I got an email from guy name Faisal asking for another day to try to fix it and when another 2 days passed no-one called me.  However. I love kindle and the Amazon,  so I returned the broken one and ordered the new one.  So far, So good.  It working just fine.  Just after I received my new Kindle,  Phylicia left a message and was asking about a status of my broken kindle,  really?  I have  New one already. YOU ARE ALLING ME 2 WEEKS AFTER? You are lucky that I I love Amazon and I am a loyal customer.
Reviews.Title: silk browser not working

Reviews.Author: Joe from LA
Reviews.Content: This has to be the most amazing device of its kind. The USB port is a major plus. The range of free apps is impressive. Moving between languages (Spanish/English) is easy. So why 4 stars? The 24/7 instant help feature is marvellous, but not the competence of the techs. I have called many times because I wanted to know all the ins and outs of the product. Most of the techs were great, but not all. One was marginal and one was embarrassingly incompetent. Don't hesitate to get a second opinion if you are not convinced. Got my new one on EBay. Hint.
Reviews.Title: Only one "but"

Reviews.Author: Linda A. Vincent
Reviews.Content: This I my third Kindle.  I like to update every few years.  The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", with Wi-Fi is the best.  Really cannot say enough about it.  Books, Books on tape, movies and TV shows, etc., it does it all and then some.  I will always stick with the Kindle!
Reviews.Title: Best device on the market

Reviews.Author: darin harvey
Reviews.Content: What are you going to use your tablet for?  I did a bit of research on the different kinds of tablets available and most guides I read suggested considering a variation of this question.  I use my tablet primarily for media consumption.  My primary concern was picking a tablet that streamed videos through my Amazon Prime account. This left me with two choices: the Kindle Fire HDX or an iPad.  I chose the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 over the iPad Air because I could get the 64 GB Kindle for less than a 16 GB iPad Air.  I was also disappointed with the letter boxing on the iPad Air when it played HD movies.  While the Kindle has a smaller screen than the iPad Air, it has a bigger picture when watching movies than the iPad.  Perhaps the iPad uses more of the screen when playing TV shows and older movies, I don't know, but it only uses a portion of the screen when playing newer movies in HD.  The Kindle Fire HDX uses the entire screen when playing HD movies.  I regularly use Netflix, Amazon streaming, and Hulu Plus and have no complaints with the HDX's performance on this front.  The speakers are more than adequate for watching movies and listening to music.  I have no experience with other tablet speakers so I can't make a comparison, but the HDX speakers are well placed, clear, loud, and don't sound tinny.  Reading on the HDX is very easy.  I have the Nook, Aldiko, Moon+ Reader, and Comixology apps, and of course the Kindle App is pre-loaded on the HDX.  The HDX is quite light and easy to hold, in either portrait or landscape mode, for extended periods of time.  I'm very happy with the battery life as well.  I get 13 hours on a full charge.  On weekdays, after work, I can use the HDX for two days in a row before I have to think about plugging it in.  On weekends the tablet will last an entire day of almost constant use before needing to be charged.  I've only ran the battery down to 0% once, and I think it took a little over six hours to reach 100%.The biggest problem with the Kindle Fire HDX is the app store.  Since the Kindle Fires are closed off from the Google Play store I thought Amazon would focus on quality over quantity with regards to apps offered, but that doesn't seem to be the case.  There seems to be an abundance of cheap, poorly designed apps and a noticeable absence of certain popular apps.  The 1Mobile Market rectifies this a bit, but I still find the absence of some popular apps in the Amazon app store curious.  I would like a Google Drive app, but have to settle with accessing it through the browser.  With a little bit of research, I've found workarounds for most problems, but it's annoying to not have simple, direct access to apps other tablets have.  I'm also not a big fan of the carousel on the home screen, but I suppose some people may prefer it.The Kindle Fire HDX has some real limitations, but on the whole I am happy with my purchase.  If you want to use your tablet for work, you may want to do some more research to make sure the Kindle Fire will do want you need.  If you want a portable media player to watch movies, play music, browse the internet, and read books the Kindle Fire HDX is a good choice.
Reviews.Title: Good for media consumption.

Reviews.Author: Nurturer69
Reviews.Content: I have a 7" Kindle Fire and with the sound turned up high, the sound is actually LOUD. But with this Kindle, the highest setting is like a third of the sound level of my Kindle Fire - the older version Kindle. Speaker size perhaps or ohms level, as this Kindle is half as thin as my Kindle Fire, perhaps is the reason. Whatever the reason, and to be sure there is a reason, the sound quality is weak. Know that going in.I do like the light weight. The size is nice for reading. But again, I would have expected that this being the newest, 'better' Kindle, Amazon's most expensive, would have been OUTSTANDING in every way. Obviously, they know how to do it. So . . . why is the sound weak. A disappointment.UPDATE: I returned the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", for poor quality speaker sound. I believe if you purchase lower quality and keep it, it means you agree to the low quality. On another note, the Amazon reps were very courteous and helpful.
Reviews.Title: Had to return it. Too bad.

Reviews.Author: Plain & Simple
Reviews.Content: I am definitely not the type to complain however comma this is to be viewed as informing the prospective consumer.. NOT a complaint.That being said, the bells & whistles on this product are really cool.  Great display & very user friendly/intuitive.  My purpose for purchasing this device is to connect wirelessly (via bluetooth) to watch video on the screen & listen to the audio with a variety of bluetooth enabled devices.  It was difficult enough to find in the description of this product whether it was bluetooth capable or not.  My error for thinking a bluetooth enabled device will connect to another bluetooth enabled device -- this is not the case.Unfortunately, the Kindle Fire is not compatible in connecting via bluetooth with the Apple iPhone 5 (iOS 7).  Amazon tech support stated that the device will not connect via bluetooth to any Apple device since Apple is a competitor.The rep at Amazon suggested calling in advance to find out what devices the Kindle Fire is compatible with before purchasing.  I have a difficult time understanding why Amazon would not simply include a chart in the product description that outlines which devices the Kindle Fire is bluetooth compatible with and which ones it is not compatible with... that's my two cents worth!Other than that, contacting Amazon's tech support was easy & the rep was extremely helpful in assisting me with processing the return.Peace
Reviews.Title: ****BLUETOOTH FEATURE NOT COMPATIBLE WITH iPHONE****

Reviews.Author: Christopher M Kenney
Reviews.Content: First of all, let me say that the Kindle Fire is barely 'okay' for what it is intended as - a media player.  The carousel interface is kind of neat, but more often gets in the way of finding the content you want to use at than assists in it.  That it tries very hard to direct you into purchasing new things rather than letting you get to things you have already bought and now want to use just makes it worse.
