While some of the features can't be had anywhere else due to Amazon licensing terms (and the only reason this isn't getting 1 star) you know who you are if you want these.While I'll agree that a media player needs a nice screen, and this certainly has it, the problem is that the rest of its' technical specs are complete overkill for the job at hand.  You simply don't need quad-core, dedicated graphics, or massive internal storage if all you're going to be doing is reading books offline and streaming movies.  And boy, do they want you to stream over downloading.This is even further hampered by several bizarre decisions in the design.  Rear-facing speakers make it difficult to hear the thing even in relatively quiet environments without turning it up to the point where you will bother other people.  The keyboard and dictionary features are weak compared to Google's and Apple's offerings, making the touchscreen keyboard a pain to use effectively.  And the internal power management means that it often can't take advantage of the increased battery life - playing an HD movie drains the battery FASTER than a power cable can supply it.The Amazon app store is a complete joke.  My last tablet was an HP Touchpad, and before I installed Cyanogenmod the app store for THAT had easier, cheaper access to needed features.  When compared to Google Play and iTunes you just have to laugh.If all you're looking for is a cheap way to get access to Amazon content, consider the Kindle Fire HD - at over 200 bucks cheaper the minimal loss of resolution is probably justified, and you can actually connect that directly to an HDTV instead of needing an expensive new wireless setup of questionable utility (another strike against the HDX).  If you want a full-featured tablet, look at the iPad Air or one of the new KitKat-based Android tablets that should be coming out soon.Only buy the HDX if you seriously can't live without the ability to download a small subset of Prime-access videos.
Reviews.Title: Enthusiasts AVOID!

Reviews.Author: Don Weber
Reviews.Content: This is a very nicely done product, but not quite as intuitive as the iPad. It's easy once you've spent some time with it. The display is the centerpiece of the Kindle. It is razor sharp and gorgeous. It would be five stars except, the most irritating thing about it is, the continual dropping of the wireless signal. We only use it at home and once it drops the signal, it either has to be turned on/off, or by switching the airplane mode on and off. I contacted Kindle tech services and they had no clue as to why this is happening. There is much written about this problem on the internet. Amazon needs to recognize it and come up with a fix. I know it's not my router, because our iPad 2 and Sony desktop, never have this problem. It's still a great value for the price.
Reviews.Title: Would be 5 stars except....

Reviews.Author: Gustav Ratzenhofer "Gus"
Reviews.Content: Difficult to navigate and very touchy.  Have decided to return it and go back to my abacus. Perhaps a person of need will acquire this used Kindle and find a use for it.
Reviews.Title: Awkward

Reviews.Author: Diane Loll
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle fire HD for my son & the HDX for myself. I didn't think the graphics were all that wonderful and side by side the HD looked better. The HDX kept locking up everytime I tried to play a game or watch a movie. I called tech and tech was in the Philippines!  And, she just had me reset the HDX to factory settings.  I did that several times and it still licked up.  I sent it back and bought the Kindle HD and I love it!! Honestly. ..it's just not eorth the extra money.  Id but the Kindle fire HD again and again. And I did! I git one fir my mom and my oldest do as well. That's 4 Kindle Fire HD's to show how much I live it! My mom loves hers and my 13 year old son loves his too. A grest gift fir you and those you live♡
Reviews.Title: Not worth upgrading from Kindle Fire HD 8.9 to HDX

Reviews.Author: Carl D. Willis-Ford
Reviews.Content: If you've never used another tablet (iPad, Nexus, etc.) before, you may really enjoy the Kindle Fire...the hardware is very good, the display is very nice, and you get Amazon goodness.However -If you're used to one of those other tablets, beware.  First of all, for a premium tablet, the Kindle Fire doesn't have GPS.  Secondly, you are SEVERELY limited in what you can do with this tablet.  Amazon really only wants you to use for reading their books and watching their movies.  They realized that they couldn't sell a tablet without games, so have a limited set of games available.  This is NOT an Android tablet.  Amazon took the Android operating system and seriously customized it, removing the ability to use any browser other than the one they wrote (at least one if not ore generations behind current Chrome, Firefox, or Opera), you can't use the Google Play Store, you have to use Amazon's store, which doesn't have near the variety of apps.All in all, it is disappointing that Amazon advertises this as an iPad competitor, when it is so ridiculously limited.**Update** based on a comment, I will be more accurate and say that you can't run a browser other than Silk without sideloading it...in other words, you cannot download another browser from the Amazon App Store, you have to change a setting to allow loading apps from unknown sources, then load the browser apk file from another website or device...something that many folks that aren't tech-savvy will not want to do.My assessment still stands as-is...great hw (except missing GPS) but overly restrictive, modified OS.**Update** after using it for several months now, I bumped it up to 4 stars because I find that I do very little with it outside of reading and watching videos of my granddaughter.  For that, it is performing admirably.  I don't ask it to do all the things I ask from my iPad, so I shouldn't rate it comparably (even though it is advertised as iPad competition).
Reviews.Title: make sure you understand the limitations

Reviews.Author: Mookie
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle HDX for a month and it froze four times so far.  I have to let it power down since it won't shut off using the off button.  After recharging it, I used the Mayday button and they told me that it may have overheated and that I should do a hard reboot (hold the off button for twenty seconds).  It happened again but figured that it overheated again because the back of the Kindle WAS hot.  The third time, Mayday checked to see if I had the most recent update (I did) so I did the hard reboot and it worked fine.  I decided to do a hard reboot once a week and make sure that it doesn't overheat.  I did the reboot this morning, listened to music from my cloud and then put it down to do other stuff.  Several hours later, I picked it up to play a word search game and it FROZE AGAIN!!!  It had only been on for two minutes and the back was completely cool.  I'm done.
Reviews.Title: Frozen Hell

Reviews.Author: Jason S.
Reviews.Content: Let me get through the good things about the tablet before I go into why I feel when comparing it to any Apple iPad, from generation 1 through the new iPad Air is a comparison not for those that understand what Apple is doing with the iPad and wants to enjoy an Apple product experience.Since I feel these two tablets cannot be compared, I will give a review of the Kindle Fire HDX's features as that is the only level one could possibly compare it to an Apple iPad Air.The Kindle has an unquestionably good resolution screen with a higher PPI than the iPad Air (I will trust both companies on their numbers. As when PPI gets above what Apple calls a retina screen, my peepers cannot tell the difference).  So don't worry about the screen, either tablet presents what is being displayed in a gloriously bright and clear manner.One item that I do wish Apple had included (In an aesthetically pleasant way, of course) is a microSD slot which would allow quick transfers of data without an additional dongle that plugs into the Lightning port.  The kindle provides this out of the box.The OS that is installed on the Kindle is what is irks me the most of all and is the reason I wouldn't suggest the purchase over an iPad Air.  The kindle has an obvious purpose here and it has become overtly advertised with the discounted kindles like the Fire HDX that ruins the feel that you are getting a premium product; "Special Offers!" Once you realize what Amazon's true goal of the Kindle Fire is; to try to sell you more products from Amazon based upon what you do with your tablet, or should I call it their tablet as you are losing your privacy from where you are when you do whatever it is that you do with that* kindle.This is a deal breaker to me as I know how iOS on the iPad Air was designed and who it was designed for; the business sector and Apple users that think like the designers.  The iOS operating system is very detailed about when it is going to provide personally identifiable information to an application regardless of developer (Apple or any other).  Apple also does not let out any applications that attempt to gain user information without absolute transparency and asking first.  This walled garden is something that cannot have a price attached to it.With the Kindle HDX, you are paying for a device that is letting a company know what you are doing with their tablet at all times. When you consider this factor in the pricing hype over the Kindle HDX you would not be alone to wonder what they are paying you to use their tablet over a protected Apple iPad Air. (I cannot stop thinking of this tablet like those free* internet providers that  were around a few years back as well as those companies that used to give you a free computer that used these same targeted advertising techniques Amazon has rediscovered and deployed with the Kindle HDX).I expect Amazon to keep information on what I search their site for and what I purchase from them.  But this is where I feel our relationship should stop.  If you are comfortable with this information keeping aspect of the Kindle Fire and the absence of a large, tested and safe marketplace of applications and add-ons from tripod mounts to microphones to lens attachments and more.  The Kindle Fire HDX might be good for you. Be sure to try one out first at a Best Buy where you can compare it to the iPad Air.I will continue to use my regular Paperwhite Kindle, to read eBooks.  This is one thing the Kindle Fire can't do, surprisingly.  But to get that paper-like look you need an eINK display not a high resolution one like the Kindle Fire HDX and the iPad Air have.For my peace of mind, I am going to return the one I purchased to the store and stomach the slightly higher price of the iPad Air.  At least now I know why I am paying for the product that I will feel is COMPLETELY mine.
Reviews.Title: Warning: People who know Apple products -- The Kindle Fire is not an Apple iPad replacement.

Reviews.Author: R. Singer
Reviews.Content: Amazed to learn that Amazon prevents you from loading apps from the Google Store.  To my knowledge, Amazon's are the only Android devices that do that.  Instead, you can only load apps from Amazon.  There are dramatically less apps in Amazon's store than Googles.  All of the business and art apps that I use on my phone are not in the Amazon store.Other than that, this makes a great toy for a kid.  Toy because even the educational app selection is limited.I don't understand why more people aren't complaining about this.  I'm guessing they don't realize what they're missing.
Reviews.Title: Only good for kids.  Can't run apps from the Google Store.

Reviews.Author: John L.
Reviews.Content: Ordered this HDX 8.9 for all you've probably read about it's graphics, processing speed, light-weight, cost, etc.The way it's setup and organizes things for you to find are done well enough.The battery held up OK for me. Not great but OK. I spent 3-4 hours exploring the HDX and playing about 15 minutes of video, placed it in sleep mode and let it sit for another couple of hours and the battery was nearly drained. I wouldn't consider that excellent but OK.The wireless connection on my HDX gave out several times. Uncertain as to why as my other wireless devices were working just fine from the same location and only a few feet from the wireless router. I've read other reviews where this was a problem. Perhaps a driver upgrade for the wireless would fix the issue at a later time.For the most part, my HDX lived up to the hype but at the end of the day, I just couldn't justify spending this money on an android device which won't play nice and allow downloading/installing Google apps.Amazon simply doesn't have enough apps to fit my needs and for this reason, I had to reluctantly return it.I've read about ways to circumvent this and get some Google apps installed but it's simply not worth the hassle for me.Seems Google, Apple and Amazon all want people feeding from their trough and their trough only. Can't we all just get along? :)If you primarily live and breathe in the world of Amazon and only need browsing capabilities outside the Amazon world, this might fit your needs. Otherwise, think twice about what apps you may want or need to use and check the Amazon app store.I'm waiting for the next version of the Google Nexus 10 to see what that offers.
Reviews.Title: OK if you want to live in a walled-in world

Reviews.Author: Hardware4you
Reviews.Content: Purchased two Kindle Fire HDX...the first in November 2013...perfect in every way.  The Second Kindle Fire HDX - 64. Purchased December 15th.  Miles apart from the first one.  The machine locked up X 3 and playing a game, got black screen and nothing worked...Help in start button when game finally reset.  The three times it reset, hard reset from Kindle Fire HDX.  This means reset to Factory Defaults and start over loading apps from the cloud and input of email addresses.  I also noticed that many game apps would try to play automatically without me touching screen.  Amazon does not have a fix for this. My wife's Kindle Fire HDX plays these same games without any problem. Called and emailed Amazon Customer Service, first time ever to be treated rudely.  Spoke with foreign lady with bad English.  The big man in red must have ruined her holiday with a few bags of coal.  Solution without Amazon's help...sending unit back for a refund as defective.  I would have settled for a replacement unit but customer care being nasty took care of that idea.  I now have ordered a Apple Air 128 GB.  Suppose to be here soon.  Amazon usually blows the competition away with helpful customer service.  I have emailed them that Amazon is the best company on earth.  Bad customer service lowers them to the rest of the competition.  Sorry the Kindle Fire HDX 64 did not work correctly.  This was our Kindle number 9 and our first troublemaker.
Reviews.Title: Bad Kindle Fire HDX --- Amazon Customer Relations having bad day...

Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Although the specs for this tablet are amazing, it’s NOT for anyone who has themselves integrated with Google (i.e. Gmail, G-cal, G-drive, Hangouts, Google+, Chrome), and probably not the right choice for anyone who likes the way they currently use the internet or their smartphone.  It’s extremely limited unless you got it for reading and watching Amazon content.  You can’t easily use any of the Google things, not even the Chrome browser, so you have to start from scratch.  You can use their e-mail app and calendar to get to Gmail, but if you’re like me and you share calendars with other Gmail users, good luck figuring out how to see those on the Kindle.  I returned it and ordered the LG G Pad 8.3 Google Play Edition so it has straight Android Kit Kat, just like my Nexus 4 phone.  As soon as I logged into Google on the G Pad, it immediately downloaded all the apps that I have on my phone and everything’s ready to go.  I also downloaded the Kindle app and now I can read books just fine.  All my e-books are there waiting for me.  I’m not sure why Amazon made such a great tablet and then restricted it so severely.  It’s a shame, but just not worth the money without access to Google apps.
Reviews.Title: Nice machine, but not for Google users

Reviews.Author: Glenn R Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: Nice large easy to read screen. Has a nice selection of apps, ebooks and emagazines. Well worth the upgrade. I really like  how you order and read magazines from Amazon. Great device.
Reviews.Title: Nice screen

Reviews.Author: donald hubbard
Reviews.Content: Other than the constant adds, I am basically satisfied with the device. More choices for apps would be nice. It is my third Kindle device.
Reviews.Title: adds

Reviews.Author: Vicki L. Duhr
Reviews.Content: Have spent many hours with Mayday people trying to work through things that should have worked right out of the box. I can't even buy things from Amazon without  having  to resort to tech support.I did not buy this device to spend hoursand hours and with tech support trying to get it to work. And don't expect much help from the Mayday support. I have been waiting  4 days so far for a supervisor to return my call on one issue and 26 days on another issue...Why these devices aren't beta tested before they send them out is a mystery.NO MAP application included...since Google maps and Mapquest need GPS to  work and the Kindle Fire does not have GPS( why it doesn't is another great  mystery).Many of the  applications in the App Store don't work on Kindle fire but you have to read the reviews to glean this knowledge.
Reviews.Title: Does not meet expectations

Reviews.Author: Lawrence of Sarasota "Lawrence of Sarasota"
Reviews.Content: When I first received my Kindle, I was thrilled.  They idea of the Mayday was impressive.  But, what I found is that the Kindle is not that intuitive.  Now, after 2 1/2 months, I still stumble around looking for a way to do something and have to resort to the Mayday.  That said, a number of times, the MAYDAY staff has needed to hand me off to KINDLE SPECIALIST who do not have the ability for remote access.  They have to talk you through the situation that the MAYDAY people couldn't handle.  The current problem came about when I was getting an error message on my email.  The Mayday people had to hand me off.  to the Kindle specialist.  Eventually, the error message went away but it seemed to have wiped out my contact list.  Again, the MAYDAY people couldn't handle it so, for the second time today, I was handed off to the KINDLE SPECIALIST.  He said to wait 2 - 4 hours and see if the contact list comes back.No two ways about it, the color is great!  The convenience of getting your email is good (not withstanding the problems listed above), its great for reading Kindle books, etc, etc. It just isn't the all out winner I expected.Then, there are the claims that led me to buy the Kindle such as its improved camera and screen.  It claims, "The HDX display features dynamic image contrast, a unique feature that automatically optimizes the color of each pixel based on the amount of light in your surroundings. This makes images and videos even easier to see in any lighting conditions, including outdoors."  The truth is, I have used the camera outdoors and cannot even see the icon you need to press to take a photo!!  Is it just my unit or all units?
Reviews.Title: The longer I own it, the more problems I find.

Reviews.Author: John A. Lee
Reviews.Content: For the price, I thought I was buying a used Kindle Fire.  What I received was a KF that wasn't able to be registered with Amazon..thus many features were unable to be used.  I called Amazon customer service..they checked the serial number and said that it had been reported as lost or stolen, so they couldn't register it.  SO, I had to pay teh shipping back to the seller as well as a 10% restocking fee.  Won't use this seller ever again!
Reviews.Title: Not what I expected

Reviews.Author: Jennifer Simmons
Reviews.Content: If you need a highly functional tablet you may be disappointed. Can't even find a simple bookshelf app that you don't have to go through a thousand steps to use. Sad.
Reviews.Title: very frustrating

Reviews.Author: ChaosMom
Reviews.Content: I never thought I would own a tablet. I have issues with the way first world countries abuse conflict minerals. After doing a great bit of research I decided to buy the Kindle Fire with 32 GB. It's very easy to use. It is light weight and comfortable to hold, although I do plan on buying the origami folding case to go with it and the screen protector. I feel that I received a very good bargain for the money spent and would recommend the Kindle table to anyone. I do want to note that some people find Android tablets a better platform to work from but the Kindle is a good tablet for a beginner. I have already used the *mayday* button and was answered quickly by a young man named Anthony who was eager to help and more importantly, to teach! All in all I am thrilled!
Reviews.Title: In Love

Reviews.Author: J. Lukomski
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is a great tablet at a good price.  The sharpness of the display is fantastic and I'm glad that I purchased the larger display.  In the several months I've used it  the tablet has performed flawlessly.  I actually would rate it as a 4.5 instead of just four.  The limitation is that it doesn't support Flash and the number of apps available is still relatively smaller than available to other brands.  Haven't needed to use Help yet but its good to know the service is there.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Good Price

Reviews.Author: LLF1020
Reviews.Content: I am a huge fan of the Kindle Fire until I received the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  The Silk browser shuts down and even after Amazon sent me a refurbished unit (Amazon will only give you a refurbished unit even if you only had your unit for two months) I am still experiencing the same problem and have researched and this topic and I am not the only one. I am so disappointed in the Silk Browser. I side loaded Google Chrome last night and cross fingers so far so good.
Reviews.Title: Cautiously optimistic now that I side loaded Google Chrome

Reviews.Author: TamScamp
Reviews.Content: Bought this bigger Kindle for family use, and the ability to pre-record free movies tipped the scales to 'buy', as I have a mother and sister who both can require medical tests and such, requiring the driver to kill hours of time in a waiting room.  Being able to engage in a two hour movie fits that bill perfectly.  The movies are truly amazingly crisp and the sound quality is grand.  An unexpected bonus is the much larger playing field and larger playing 'pieces' with games.  Amazon continues to amaze me with the things the Kindles can do, and I haven't really sat down and tried out all the bells and whistles yet!
Reviews.Title: I love this one!

Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Sacks
Reviews.Content: great screen, battery life, very nice; able to use in many ways. priced right and great amazon service as always
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Sarat
Reviews.Content: One of the best tablets in the market. This is very much comparable to Apple's iPad. I wish there was a way to expand storage on this device like Samsung provides.
Reviews.Title: One of the best in the class

Reviews.Author: janice simpson
Reviews.Content: I have only had my kindle for a few days. This is my first tablet. So far I love it.
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: MAD
Reviews.Content: I spent quite a bit of time reading reviews and mulling over whether or not to buy the Kindle Fire HDX.  I'm glad I did.  It's terrific.  It allows me to do so much:  read, play word games, browse the Internet, shop, stream video, etc.  How could you not like it?  There are some quirks (e.g., the touch screen is supersensitive, so I prefer to use a stylus), but you can adjust to them easily enough.  I really needed a device that would allow me to be productive away from home, and so far the Kindle fits the bill.  I am still working my way through some of the features, but to date I am very pleased with my purchase.  Go for the 8.9" for greater ease of use.  And, the Mayday function, which I've needed to use only once--to get both purchasing and technical setup information--is invaluable.
Reviews.Title: I'm Glad I Did It

Reviews.Author: V. L.
Reviews.Content: While many things are decent with this device, Amazon built in a "feature" that doesn't let you take pictures with third party cases on it. It's a software thing they did intentionally to force people to buy their ridiculously over priced Oragami case, which is heavy and gets poor reviews. This is really poor behavior from Amazon. The forums are.lit up with people complaining. Amazon could fix it easily, but that would cost profit on the Oragami.
Reviews.Title: Amazon built in software to force you to buy overpriced Oragami

Reviews.Author: Joe Brockmeier
Reviews.Content: The killer feature for this tablet, for me, is being able to download Amazon Prime content for later use. I travel quite a bit, and wanted to be able to watch movies/shows available via Prime when I am on the road. Unfortunately, there are several "gotchas" with this feature that make the Kindle quite a disappointment.1) You might think that *all* Amazon Prime shows / movies would be available for download. You'd be wrong. It seems most TV shows are available, but movies? I'd say maybe 1 out of 4 movies I looked at are available for download.2) Even when you download content, Amazon wants to "phone home" frequently due to DRM. I took the tablet on a two-week trip to Europe where I had infrequent access to Wi-Fi and wanted to watch shows on flights. Several movies refused to play at all unless I connected to Wi-Fi to "correct a problem" that demanded Internet access. This was a rude surprise, and I was deeply disappointed that having spent quite a bit of time loading the Kindle with content turned out to be a waste of time.Since the Kindle Fire is based on Android, you might expect to have some of Android's more popular apps - like Chrome, YouTube, or Google Maps. Nope. None of these are easily available on the Kindle Fire.I will give the Fire high marks as a playback device. If you download content in its highest resolution, it looks and sounds fantastic. The X-Ray feature is also pretty nifty, if you're connected to a network when watching shows on Amazon Streaming. Unfortunately, I didn't really buy it for home streaming - I have a TV to watch content on when I'm home.Bottom line: I'm really sorry that I bought it. I hope Amazon will open up the download feature to other tablets before too long, as I'd prefer to have a tablet that does everything I want - and the Fire isn't it.
Reviews.Title: Overall, disappointing

Reviews.Author: old sarge
Reviews.Content: I love the HDX,  the display  is as good or better than than my wife's IPad, the kindle is as fast as the IPad as well.the colors on the HDX are fabulous , it is lighter than the IPad also. I have had no trouble with the HDX.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: N. Wolter "photog gal"
Reviews.Content: I received this Kindle today and began a comparison between it and my HD.I saw no discernible resolution difference between them.I did not care for the reduced size of Carousel items. Also, the power on 'button'? placement was odd-- easily powered off when holding the HDX.I'm very happy with my HD--I like the solid feel of it.I am returning the HDX.
Reviews.Title: HDX is OK, but...

Reviews.Author: jerry R
Reviews.Content: I am a 74 year old gentleman without very much training on how to use a tablet and i am having much trouble getting information on how to use my kindle fire WI -FI . please EMAIL me with some help thank you.
Reviews.Title: need some help on how to connect to my ATT moble wi fi

Reviews.Author: J. Lerner "Ny Ranger fan"
Reviews.Content: Let me start out by saying I an Amazon Prime member. I love the whole ecosystem. I bought this because I loved the idea of being able to download the Prime videos. I find that Amazon limits only a very select number of movies to download. To me, thats a major mistake. This unit has the best picture for watching movies. Its actually incredible. However, since this unit only uses a limited version of Android your missing allot of apps.Its a fast unit not any faster than the iPad air.The sound coming out of this unit is the best!As a reader its excellent-unlike the smaller version there is no blue haze while reading your books.In short an excellent unit but misses the mark-If you want a more well rounded unit go iPad air or Nexus units if Android is your preferred system.
Reviews.Title: Very good but missing the mark-too bad..I wanted to like this unit!

Reviews.Author: Beth R.
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle hdx. I am disappointed because I thought it was hdmi compatible. I do like the x ray feature and the mayday.
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Prime Risk "primerisk"
Reviews.Content: We took the leap and went for the 8.9" HDX this year after having 3 original Fires in the family for the last two years.  I also have a slew of other comparable devices including the Nexus 7 and iPad.  The HDX is just incredible.  The screen is gorgeous, very fast, and is so light it is believable.  My cousin's daughter got an iPad mini for Christmas and was absolutely drooling over our HDX.  She is a complete iHead and has said "nothing is better than Apple".  Well, she's rethinking those statements now.I'd like to comment on the Mayday functionality, but we had no reason to use it.  Everything worked perfectly as soon as we took it out of the box.  As soon as we put it on the wifi network it knew what account it was associated with and all of our books, music, and apps were all there where we expected them.  (We did have to specifically download applications we wanted, but they were all there associated with our account).  Just perfectly simple.My one problem though, we have 3 original Fires and only one HDX 8.9.  I see more HDXs in our future.  That's ok, I also got a Sonos system for Christmas and it will make it easy to leave the original Fires laying around as Sonos controllers!
Reviews.Title: Wow..just wow

Reviews.Author: Juanita Harris
Reviews.Content: The screens so big,I didn't think it would be this much larger than my Fire,but it's really sooo much bigger.We spend a lot of time traveling so I bought this so I could download movies to watch.I've only done one and it played  fantastic.I read a reveiw by a guy that had all the data on this and several others so scroll till you find it,it's very imformative.I'm not an expert,just love to read,facebook,ect while watching football or on the road,and I've found a new companion!
Reviews.Title: wow

Reviews.Author: BRENDA BENNETT
Reviews.Content: very sorry to say this but I wanted something like the ipad and I found this and just knew that this was it.  everything compared to the apple ipad, and the price for the kindle was less.  could not wait to get it, we all liked it.  but know every time we tried a game it would lock up and nothing we did got it to work again.  we had to set it aside until the next day then it would work for some time then quit again.  sorry to of sent it back.
Reviews.Title: loved at 1st

Reviews.Author: Stephen Alden Greer
Reviews.Content: Well I have had this device for about 7 days and it's so capable. But the capabilities are lacking. Heavily. The app store is terrible. And I'd be fine with this if it was a cheap device. But for $394 I can get a Microsoft surface which will run everything I need. I may send this back for a refund. I love the book reading capability. Which is what I first requested it for. But you can apparently download an app that does the same thing on a surface. The case is hard to find I don't have the patience to chase one down. I dunno it's a cool device. But buy something else if you need a functional everyday tablet.
Reviews.Title: Eh.

Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: This is a total upgrade from my kindle fire hd! I love that there is a rear view camera and that it has flash. The camera also has very good quality. I totally recommend this kindle :D !!!!!!
Reviews.Title: Total Upgrade:)

Reviews.Author: Mark A. Hopper
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle and then the Kindle Fire and now the HDX.  I have loved all my Amazon products.  The picture and image quality on the HDX is far superior to other devices.  And the integration to all my Amazon products and features is great.Finding new things everyday like the lyrics feature with my music.Way to go Amazon!
Reviews.Title: HD-Xcellence!

Reviews.Author: Brian Meiers
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 with high expectations.  Having seen and used friends Kindles, I was looking forward to seeing what the HDX had to offer.  I was NOT disappointed.  It has been easy to use, has beautifully clear images and the sound quality is AMAZING.  My family loves this Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Better than expected!

Reviews.Author: SJM
Reviews.Content: This serves 2 purposes it gives my daughter a camera and a tablet.  She loves it and is constantly on it.  The set up was very easy to follow.
Reviews.Title: Daughters gift

Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great! It definitely rivals an iPad and has amazing battery life. It looks really good and all around it's definitely with it's price.
Reviews.Title: one of the best

Reviews.Author: Smooth "Smooth"
Reviews.Content: I have the old Kindle reader so since i want to go online and play games an such i decided on the new Kindle HDX. It was a toss up between the Kindle and the Samsung note. The reason being is because i needed my tablet to have a rear camera with a flash....The Kindle won..and I am very very happy with my decision. I even used the "mayday" which is in person help right from the kindle...
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Brizi
Reviews.Content: I wasn't so sure about this at first...then I came across a store demo.  So far so food.  I had a negative visual of what a kindle fire would be like. I pictured the original grandma version.  But I'm quite impressed and surprised.  I was able to view other demos like Samsung and the IPad and it compared quite well.  The Kindle Fire HDX is attractive and efficient.  I Gove it a 4 because even though I bought it, I rather own the Samsung or the IPad and I had no idea that the Kindle FreeTime was a paid subscription although you have a 30 free trial period.  Other brands have similar feature for free.  I bought this for my son because that's what he wanted for Christmas.
Reviews.Title: Surprised!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I own all the the kindle fire's everyone of them that has came out. The Kindle HDX is far my favorite. LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE it.
Reviews.Title: MY NEW KINDLE

Reviews.Author: Ginger
Reviews.Content: I ordered Kindle Fire XHD 8.9” at about 11PM on Dec 23, the system indicated the item will arrive on Thursday, Dec 26. That’s fine because I ordered it for myself. I didn’t ask for express delivery but Amazon did it. I received 2 packages from Amazon at 11AM on Dec 24, just an hour before my office closed for the holiday. One I knew what it was and the other I didn’t because I didn’t expect to receive the Kindle Fire XHD 8.9” until Dec 26. I opened the package thinking my daughter probable ordered a book from my “Wish List” for me and have it delivered to my office just in time. I was very surprised, amazed and pleased to find the package contained Kindle Fire XHD 8.9”. How did Amazon deliver it within 12 hours! And like many other reviewers I own a few version of kindle; the first generation of Kindle, the Kindle Keyboard, the first generation of Kindle Fire (still functioning perfectly). But reading a lot of reviews, seeing the ads and being a royal customer of Kindle family I have to try the Kindle Fire XHD 8.9”. I can’t give a review about the product yet because it is still in the box but I am impressed with how Amazon can get it to me within 12 hours. My Christmas wish is fulfilled. Thank you Amazon.
Reviews.Title: Got it within 12 hours!

Reviews.Author: Agnes Murphy
Reviews.Content: It will take me a while to get to know my way around on this new instrument but I am enjoying it.
Reviews.Title: A Surprise Gift

Reviews.Author: R. Lurer
Reviews.Content: No third party apps like ALL my Realtor apps can't be used, can't put Chrome on am Android based tablet meaning no chromecast, otherwise utterly brilliant.
Reviews.Title: Brilliance within the Amazon market ecosystem

Reviews.Author: Allen G. Slocumb
Reviews.Content: I gave my Kindle Touch to a friend of ours and bought this unit. Book reading is great, lots and lots of aps. Couldn't be more pleased.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: cincydon
Reviews.Content: I am giving this to my wife for Christmas. After setting it up befor wrapping it along with the matching case I was blown away. This is her third upgrade and by far the best yet. I will update after Christmas.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Display

Reviews.Author: Mary E. Collins
Reviews.Content: It's a great product and I love. It's way better and functional then the Nook tablet. I did not find any problem with navigating around on the Kindle Fire. This was a free trial, so I will be returning it. I will however purchase the Kindle Fire HDX 7' due to the price. I can only afford the smaller version.
Reviews.Title: Great product, but too expensive!

Reviews.Author: northcountry2 "northcountry2"
Reviews.Content: I bought the largest capacity one and I love that about the device. What I do NOT love is that when you have to call for service - at least in my experience, a lot of the people are not knowledgeable enough to be able to help you with the new HDX.
Reviews.Title: Device is good, help, not so much.

Reviews.Author: Mark J. Koviac
Reviews.Content: wish there were more apps, but knew that when I purchasedenjoy the light weightbattery life should be longer
Reviews.Title: Good but not great

Reviews.Author: skyscraper
Reviews.Content: ****Update****:- I analyzed the screen brightness issue/feature. The auto brightness setting is basically too sensitive. It adjusts even if you are indoors and just unknowingly move your hands with respect to the light source. I have increased the rating to 4 stars as I can easily live with this issue. I am taking away a star because of the known rare camera issue when tablet is put in a case (it keeps showing "please slide" message).I am seeing the same issue that is observed by some of the others... My screen brightness auto adjusts for no reason. Not sure if its a hardware or software issue. It would be great if Amazon can clarify. Apart from this issue, this is the best tablet I have worked on so far.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet,Auto screen brightness is too sensitive...

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Use it everyday! I was surprised to find that some of the 'free' apps don't work with it because of the Amazon process but it still allowed me to buy them, which was weird.All in all, I love it.
Reviews.Title: love it.

Reviews.Author: Alshoon
Reviews.Content: Between Prime, the picture quality, weight, speed, and the build quality, this thing is an easy 5 stars. After using it for a bit I realized 16gb would not be enough to fully enjoy the device, so I returned it and ordered the 64gb. couldnt be happier, well unless it had an sd card option. I am attached to this device. I take it everywhere and no longer bring my laptop to night classes. I even returned my surface pro 2!
Reviews.Title: Everything I need. Love it!

Reviews.Author: Virginia Pounds
Reviews.Content: This was a surprise gift.  It has all the great features I use and need in this updated Kindle.  It is easy to learn to operate.  Love it!!!
Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Duffer. "Bo"
Reviews.Content: Excellent display. Good battery life. Easy to carry around due to its light weight. Response time is rapid. I have had other tablets but this is far away the best.
Reviews.Title: The Champ

Reviews.Author: David M. Riley "Purgatory"
Reviews.Content: In love with my HDX 8.9".  Easy to set up, virtually did nothing on my end.  It had transferred all my stuff from my older Kindle HD, and then I unregistered the old one, and gave it to my wife to register.  No problems.Screen resolution amazing, and the crispness and colors.  I watch a lot of movies, which is great on the HDX.Since I am happily hooked up with Amazon Prime anyhow, makes me one happy customer.Everything I wanted in a tablet, for barely half the price of the same I-Pad, and none of Apple's nonsense.BTW, I bought the 64 GB version, without the ads.  And a red leather origami case, works great too.No complaints from this user
Reviews.Title: Falling in love with my new HDX 8.9" tablet - no complaints

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had Kindles since they first came out. I have loved them all, this is the very best. I love it very much. The only thing I have trouble with is that if you get your finger too close to the screen it will change things, turn a page, loose a puzzle piece, turn page over, that kind of thing. A lot of that may be my fault, I have old hands.
Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Does all I wanted it to do and more.  I just love it. It works just like a regular tablet and does everything I ask of it.
Reviews.Title: Outstanding product

Reviews.Author: Nat P
Reviews.Content: Just got the new 8.9 HDX today(Nov 7,2013).  Doesn't weigh hardly anything; the video is stunning; it's so thin.  A piece of cake to figure out if you've ever used a Kindle before.  I'm in the process of reading my first book.  The screen is so clear, to me it's comparable to my wife's paper white.  And yes, the new operating system with the WIFI is blazing!A bit expensive but so far worth every penny.  If anything changes, which I doubt, I'll amend this review.
Reviews.Title: Yet another kindle for me.

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "love country"
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it - from the size of the screen to the simplicity to use it (of course I bought the Kindle Fire HDX book to go with it as a just in case. lol).  I would rather read than watch movies or DVDs, so I haven't actually tried those features.  I especially love the automatic background light adjustment feature.  No more trying to guess where the Brightness button is located when I forget to turn up the light for daytime use.  I even used the Help feature once.  It was great to have someone answer immediately to assist me!  I have had the Kindle 2, the Kindle Fire, and now this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" and this is my favorite one of the 3.  The only problem I have had so far is that I haven't figured out how to download the pictures from the Fire HDX to my PC, so I'll have to consult the book on that (I think I will need to upload them to the cloud then download from there to the PC).  I use it enough that I have to recharge it everyday, but that is no problem.  I read my first generation Fire while it is charging.  I love the way they sync between each other.  Thank you, Amazon, for a GREAT product!!
Reviews.Title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Author: Marcio Barroso
Reviews.Content: I was almost buying one, but: no FLAC ==> no buying.I can't believe Amazon missed the most important audio format nowadays.
Reviews.Title: Missing capital free audio format

Reviews.Author: Sissy39
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase a tablet vs. a laptop after having an IPad loaned to me from work for a year.  The IPad was okay, and it did the job, but it had its issues; kind of iffy WiFi reception (even in my house), problems playing certain types of videos that required flash player, etc.  I did a fair amount of research, for a layperson, read lots of reviews, and decided to purchase this tablet instead of going for a laptop.  My main reason for doing so was portability; so much easier transporting a tablet.  I really needed something to access work sites from home, do professional reading, casual reading, watch a movie here and there, play a game.The first thing that I noticed was that the graphics were amazing. Crisp, clear pictures; clean lines, really gorgeous.  WiFi reception was much improved within my house, pages loaded faster than the IPad, so far so good.  Then I began running into some snags.  Amazon doesn't have the app we use for our company email (First Class), which was available on the IPad.  I am able to enter using a browser, but the site does not function as well.  I tried to access another company website and was met with "Error 500" codes when trying to login; again, not a problem I had on the IPad.  This one hurt, because I actually had to get in to do some work, so I had to kick my 15 year old off of his desktop to get into our company website (that was enjoyable for both of us).I did play one puzzle game and it was great-no hangups or lags; same with watching a movie.  I wish I could say that everything went well in this area, but I also ran into some snags.  Some games aren't available for the HDX, only the non-HDX versions of the Kindle, but are advertised by Amazon as "Available for Kindle".  It gets frustrating when you think you've found something, only to find its a non-compatible version.  If you go looking for games on popular sites like Big Fish or Google Play, you notice how far behind in the market Android is compared to IPad (I was schooled by a 7-year old in a rather know-it-all tone).So, is the Kindle the end-all-be-all? Well, it's nice, but not quite the workhorse/playhorse their ads make it seem.  I'm off to buy a laptop and will keep this around for reading and surfing.
Reviews.Title: Meh

Reviews.Author: Linda Rae
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with various different avenues to choose from. To read or listen to a book this is great.
Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Author: mathew d herford
Reviews.Content: I am not knowledgeable about most gadgets, nor do I try to keep up with the latest trends in technology. I got this primarily for reading books while out of the house. I opted to go with the HDX because I dislike the later generations of the simple Kindles. The minimal button layout doesn't appeal to those of us with clunky fingers.The battery life is decent. I can surf the internet or read continuously all day without having to recharge it other than at night.The picture seems really good, but I am not picky with that sort of thing.E-book prices range from amazingly good to outrageously overpriced. Staying diligent, I am confident one could find a dozen books to read a month for less than $30.Overall, it's one of the best purchases I've ever made. I would recommend it to anyone who reads often and wants to read a lot on a limited budget.
Reviews.Title: A layman's perspective

Reviews.Author: SUSAN JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: The pictures are way cool - lots you can doVery easy to use.  did have to return a cover...remember to look for HDX
Reviews.Title: all that  hoped for and more!

Reviews.Author: Shirley Souza "Shirley"
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Fire 7.0, but I decided I wanted a little bigger screen so I could read my e-mails easier.  This Kindle Fire did the trick.  I just love it.  It is so clear and easy to use.  I also like the "Mayday" button feature.  It really does what Amazon says it would.  Now, I keep my smaller Kindle in the car with me so I will have something to use when I'm waiting for someone or I have an appointment.  It works wonderful.  I am so happy I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.
Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!

Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: I really love my new kindle.  This is my second one, but my other one is the smaller size, great for travel.  This kindle has great graphics and is easier for the kids to play with, it also allows for more aps that the smaller size can not support.
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: cjenk
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the Kindle Fire.  I am so happy I purchased the 8.9".  Takes fantastic pictures, it is light and easy to carry around.  I take it where ever I go so I don't have idle hands or get bored.  Highly recommend.
Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love

Reviews.Author: john jamsion
Reviews.Content: lot easier to use then I had expected, I use it every day to keep track of whats coming up.
Reviews.Title: great device

Reviews.Author: Margarette White
Reviews.Content: This is a tablet anyone should want.  I would recommend this tablet to anyone.  I enjoy mine very much.ENJOY
Reviews.Title: Thank you Kindle

Reviews.Author: Kathryn L. Mcqueen "amazonwomyn"
Reviews.Content: Fast, clear & bright picture for sure.  But for the price, I believe an iPad is a better value.  The pull down screen was unresponsive in a protect case (required a MayDay call.)  I'm not much of a gamer, but the Kindle is perfect for Amazon.com prime, etc.  So I returned it and purchased the cheaper refurbished HD 8.9 Kindle and I'm very happy with it.  It meets all my needs, just isn't quite as fast processing.
Reviews.Title: HDX is beautiful but....

Reviews.Author: Linda Locke
Reviews.Content: I had the 7 inch and traded up to this one.  I love being able to sit on my porch and surf the web.  The price and features are amazing.
Reviews.Title: i love my kindle

Reviews.Author: Kary
Reviews.Content: I think it has good graphics,and is relatively easy to use. It holds it's charge well. I like that my reading material was transferred without my having to do anything
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 revue

Reviews.Author: Michael Norton
Reviews.Content: I have a 64 Gig Kindle and PRIME.  FREE Movies and TV.  Sweet!  I highly recommend them.  It's wonderful.  I bought them for myself.  Worth every penny.
Reviews.Title: WOW!

Reviews.Author: Dean McCallum
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her Kindle Fire.  She has had to contact them a number of times to figure out how to do some things, but better them than me.  I just got exasperated coming into a tech problem she would have and expected to fix it for her instantly.

Reviews.Author: Marsha L. Biggs
Reviews.Content: I went from the Kindle Fire to the HDX 8.9 and just fell in love with the larger screen. I have only had this about a month but really like the ease of use and the rapid access to the different apps and programs.
Reviews.Title: Love the larger screen!

Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: This is my fifth Kindle.  It handles great.  I used Mayday twice and they were very helpful and very professional.  They were also very knowledgeable.
Reviews.Title: Can't miss

Reviews.Author: Christina R. Parranto "Cristy Parranto"
Reviews.Content: Love the quality, color, speed and ease of use. The upgrades made tot this Kindle is well worth the price.
Reviews.Title: Great Tabliet!!!

Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Hawk
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  This is the third Kindle I own!  I don't go anywhere without my Kindle!
Reviews.Title: Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Bruce Hostetler
Reviews.Content: My wife is extremely pleased with her new Kindle HDX 8.9 with all the bells and whistles.She takes it everywhere.
Reviews.Title: Extremely Pleased

Reviews.Author: Yamil Camilo
Reviews.Content: I choose Kindle HDX 8.9 because the 7" is too little for me. The screen is bright and the sound is excellent. Also is paired up with my Fire TV.Using now as my main Tablet. I use mainly Apple products but these new amazon products gain me over.Maybe I will use an amazon phone in the future...LOL...
Reviews.Title: Excellent Product. Size about right. Good Sound

Reviews.Author: JimMetcalf
Reviews.Content: I own an older Kindle-great for reading and playing games but not much else.  The HDX is more practical-can E-mail as usable speeds, play videos, movies,games,function as alarm clock, and the large screen is easy to see.  The picture quality is better than previous Kindle readers.  The HD screen displays colors and graphics is stunning detail and brilliant colors!  This is a fast machine! Mine has the 32G  HDX is more user friendly than most tablet computers!  I checked all available tablets,readers and selected the HDX as a good value!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Leodell Philpott
Reviews.Content: The screen size is enjoyable and it has a very good clear picture. Now my granddaughter want to get one.
Reviews.Title: I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Author: Rob Gallagher
Reviews.Content: Great unit.  We are enjoying it.  Does everything we need it to and beyond.  Would recommend to anyone looking for this type of tablet.
Reviews.Title: As advertised!

Reviews.Author: elliott
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my needs of a lightweight tablet. Clear and sharp picture, easy to use and quick internet response.
Reviews.Title: i love my kindle fire hdx 8.9

Reviews.Author: Ashley McNabb
Reviews.Content: Love!!!
Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Author: Barney GM "barney"
Reviews.Content: It is an good display and is intuitive in use.  A improvement over the Kindle that I had before my wife captured it.
Reviews.Title: The FIRE display.

Reviews.Author: Jack Lim
Reviews.Content: I got this a day ago and its switch on and start surfing for books and videos! It logs-on to my home wifi immediately and after input of password, it starts working! Great piece of tablet! Yeah!
Reviews.Title: Couldn't get my hands off!

Reviews.Author: Susan Burkey
Reviews.Content: i gave as a gift and she love it so much she is no longer using her phone thank you i can Skype her now
Reviews.Title: love

Reviews.Author: Alan626
Reviews.Content: This HDX is the ultimate of all the Kindles. I have had most of them and I love this HDX. The color is so very good. Actually everything about it is as advertised. The only problem I have is with the Bluetooth. It connects and stays connected but the sound is jerky. They told me about 3 weeks ago that here would be a fix sent to me but I still have the jerky sound. Even with this problem...I LOVE MY HDX!!!
Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB -...

Reviews.Author: Cathy Parker
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire but you have to be in an area where you can get a strong signal.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Disadvantages

Reviews.Author: C. Galloway
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle.  It is everything I expected. I would recommend the kindle to my friends.  I can do everything I want from the kindle.
Reviews.Title: everything I expected

Reviews.Author: Heather D'Errico
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx 64gb. It is quick, has vibrant color, plenty of storage, does everything I need it too. I love it!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Kevin C. Sparenberg
Reviews.Content: This tool is providing me with more than I expected. The movies, TV shows, and radio selections are great. I am able to read many more books now because I can adjust the print to large print. I plan to purchase a Smart TV so I can try out that feature. The purpose for the purchase was to try out educational games and apps to include in the Instructional Design of online classes. I have been impressed with the possibilities.
Reviews.Title: More than I expected.

Reviews.Author: Georgette A.
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, so I have little to compare it with. There are certain sites that I cannot use like Polyvore and some sites that require Adobe Flash Player that I cannot access...
Reviews.Title: Adobe Flash Player Please...

Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Order this for my friends wife and she can't stay off it. Worth every penny. Amazon is stepping it up!
Reviews.Title: Really is Fire!~

Reviews.Author: Ron Jones
Reviews.Content: I have never been happier with any of my purchases. This is the cream of the crop. My Kindle Fire HDX has become a permanent tool in my life. It's super easy to use, "EASY TO USE". It has a great display with beautiful resolution.  Tons of free app's. Email, teleconferencing, web, long battery life, and did I mention EASY TO USE. I love it. Hurry up, get yours!
Reviews.Title: Thank heaven for new technology. the Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Mark Rocchio
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindle- the 8.9" size is perfect; it's very easy to navigate; the Mayday service is fantastic and it's easy to navigate especially for a Tablet newbie like me!
Reviews.Title: So glad we waited!

Reviews.Author: Jan "JANZ"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this model to replace my Kindle 2nd version and it quit working right.  I am happy with it but can't get apps for some things I want like Allstays for campgrounds and java so I can play pogo games.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Gretchen Thompson
Reviews.Content: I wish you had a book or booklet on how to use all the things that the Kindle can do.  I am not real computer wise  so a instruction book would help me a lot.  I know it has the May day help & I have had to use them on a lot of times.  But a info booklet would be much more helpful.  One should have been included for people like me.  Other wise I like it.  It is fun to play games on but I would like to do other things also.  Thank you.  Gmt
Reviews.Title: Instruction book needed

Reviews.Author: Designer
Reviews.Content: It's a little smaller than an IPad but large enough to where you won't be squinting. This Kindle has a lot of upgraded features that you won't find on other products. One of the upgrades is the mirroring program for you HDTV which unless you have a Smart TV you won't be able to use this feature. But there is a product out there that is compatible with your HDTV and this Kindle and will turn your TV into a Smart TV, it's the Netgear PushTV2. Some of the other features are as I'm writing this review words are being displayed above the keyboard and all I have to do is tap on it to be put into the sentence.  This is a good product and that's why I gave it five stars.
Reviews.Title: Excellent Product

Reviews.Author: suzee "suzee"
Reviews.Content: Love it so fast and fun to use. I was still using my Kindle Fire 1st edition, and this one blows it away.
Reviews.Title: Lighting fast

Reviews.Author: John F. Davis
Reviews.Content: I like it. Books and movies. Pity I can't use the android store. I use my apps more than watch movies.
Reviews.Title: great but no android store

Reviews.Author: R. Burriss
Reviews.Content: I like my kindle..from what others have told me the clarity is really good and the price was perfect. I haven't travel with it yet. But it works well for me
Reviews.Title: perfect tablet

Reviews.Author: Judith A Houston
Reviews.Content: After so many years on a PC  and then an iPad this system is still not familiar to me. So, I hope in time I will become more learned and consequently more at ease with this system.
Reviews.Title: Still Learning!

Reviews.Author: Nameless
Reviews.Content: I'm a slow adopter of new technology.  First tablet, and I'm glad I waited since the price-to-power ratio has gotten good.  I use this thing far more than I ever thought I would.  I've got old comic book collections that look amazing on it, my entire digital library is so easy to use in it, and the apps are really solid.  The browser that comes with it is good.  The whole thing is a solid product.  I use an iPad at work, and I'm not a mac guy, so when someone recommended this to me, I gave it a shot, and I'm far from disappointed.  It's fast, haven't noticed any hiccoughs or other problems.Only one thing: I wish I didn't have to charge it so often.  I do usually get a good 1-2 days, depending on what I'm doing.  But if I play a game on it for a few hours, it'll drain the entire charge.  Still, not a big deal to me considering how good it is.
Reviews.Title: Addicted

Reviews.Author: Susan Stone`
Reviews.Content: The larger Kindle Hdx has a great screen and brighter background than the Kindle Fire.Good product, with lots of apps.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I returned this very nice tablet, I wanted something to read newspapers and magazines, will wait for a larger screen.
Reviews.Title: As advertised

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the size, screen clarity, getting my emails, everything! I have the Kindle Paperwhite, but just had to get this Kindle as well.
Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Kirsten
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle! I use it all the time. I originally got it to try and organize my busy life with two jobs and trying to reach a fitness goal of losing fifty pounds and the there are so many helpful apps on here. Plus I have begun to start reading again and love that I can borrow books with my Amazon prime account! I was originally worried that I made a mistake since it was so expensive but I use it everyday and it has replaced my broken laptop so can't complain!
Reviews.Title: love it!

Reviews.Author: Scott Beason
Reviews.Content: if my lady is awake she is on her kindle HDX...books, apps, games, web, the only thing it doesn't do is laundry...would have gotten a 6 star rating if that was the case!
Reviews.Title: present for lady

Reviews.Author: ROGER E. TEIDEL
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very fast. It performs as you would expect it to.Sized perfect for reading and is easy to use.
Reviews.Title: I love My Kindle

Reviews.Author: my 2 lil Chihuahua's
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with my Kindle. Love the size, the shape and the weight. Sorry for the laptop that is now collecting dust because my Kindle does it all in a much more easier compact way!

Reviews.Author: Jake G.
Reviews.Content: This is the most premium tablet on the market, regardless of price, a much better experience then any ipad. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for an additional screen (computer-wise)Great for everything tablet-related, there is no reason to get another.
Reviews.Title: Best Tablet

Reviews.Author: Ayaan
Reviews.Content: I wanted to increase my reading, but still having hard time to cut my old ways of delaying thing.. Yeah I like the device so far.
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx 8.9

Reviews.Author: Mark Duncan
Reviews.Content: I love using the Kindle Fire HDX, and this is the first and only tablet I have ever used.  I bought one for my wife as a Christmas present, and liked it so much I bought one for myself.  I'm still learning about all that it can do, but so far I'm very pleased with all that it does for you, especially the Reading View choice it offers you when accessing many sites on the web.  This is a fantastic plus.
Reviews.Title: This Kindle Fire is great!

Reviews.Author: Christopher Hutton
Reviews.Content: I have used apple and I dont like the Ipad.  But this really awesome and the batterly life is better then I thought.  One thing I do not like is that you spend nearly 400 dollars and do not get a complimenty case.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Deanna Cleman
Reviews.Content: I started out with just the 7” Kindle Fire HD and really enjoy what all it could do but not enough speed and memory. I bought the Kindle Fire HDX because of size and all the other many features it has. I would recommend this to everyone. One feature it has which is great is reading with the option to enlarge the font so a person I know with bad eyesight that I recommended it to could read it. He loves it. Only thing is I wished I would of got it with Verizon built in that way i could have signal on the road.
Reviews.Title: Best Device I ever owned!

Reviews.Author: Rise Simonelli-Phillips
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting the Kindle Fire HDX for many many months. I have received various special offers with $20 off here and there but I never ordered. Finally an offer came through that I could not refuse but before I could buy it, my son bought itfor me...a very v early Mothers Day gift! I love it.I had read reviews online comparing the Kindle Fire HDX to the iPad and most said the Kindle Fire HDX was the better purchase; I agree. Both my sons have the iPad and it is a fantastic product as well but I am so thrilled with my Kindle Fire HDX, it does everything the iPad oes but weighs a little less and, because I am a prime member I have free downloads of books and movies and I also have an exchange or swap option. And by the way, I have the model with special offers and it is not a bother at all, it is on the unlock screen, the reason I chose that was not because of the $20 discounted price but because when I read more on that offer I found that I would get early notifications of products and such from Amazon.I could go on but will end with "I think you'll be pleased if you buy this product" oh yes, he also bought me a 12 item accessory bundle which was worth the price and a good addition to this purchase.
Reviews.Title: Worth the wait!

Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: I love the way the movie show and the video. The camera takes great pictures and the download to social media is super fast. I read a lot of reviews some good some bad .All of the good ones help me make my discussion. A must have .
Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 !!!!!

Reviews.Author: Margaret L Courtney
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Kindle and am in the process of learning how to use it properly. Will be a handy asset to have and work with.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I loved my first kindle , this one is so much nicer wish I would have been able to get a discount
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Lorraine
Reviews.Content: I love this new Kindle.  The Mayday button works great.  The Tech's come right on to help you.  I wouldn't be without it!
Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer

The keyboard is nice, a nice improvement from the first generation Kindle fire. There needs to be a way to use google + hangouts. That would be a nice advantage if Kindle would have apps that would allow google to participate. If you have a camera and mic, not sure why it would be so difficult  to allow live video/audio. Overall good product, and hopefully in time, the app store will greatly improve.
Reviews.Title: Impressed. Video quality superb

Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a first generation Kindle Fire.  This is terrific.  Nice size, responsive, not too heavy.  Screen layout is better than the original.  The external volume button is nice.
Reviews.Title: i love this thing

Reviews.Author: Neuf "Neuf"
Reviews.Content: It's super fast; brilliant HDX display.  Slender, light weight.  Good camera.  I gave my old Kindle Fire HD away. ha
Reviews.Title: Love it!!!

Reviews.Author: Marilyn D.
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I had made a mistake buying this. It took twice as long to get it as I was originally told. But I have to say once it got here it has been great .

Reviews.Author: nancy holmes
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed when I went on a cruise and couldn't use it in the sun . I was looking forward to using it outside this summer. I should have researched it better , however I thought for the price it would have that feature.I love everything else about it.
Reviews.Title: kindle

Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: This was my late Christmas gift to myself and I'm having a wonderful time listening to my audible books, playing games and getting on the web.  I'm 60 and finally up to date with electronics!
Reviews.Title: Love it !

Reviews.Content: I like it for the length of time the charge lasts, the larger screen, fact I can check email when traveling.It is a little heavier because it is larger and thus a more awkward fit in some of my purses. I carry it nearly everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded to this one

Reviews.Author: LINDA S. BEST
Reviews.Content: Love size and clarity. Help button is wonderful. Love touch screen. Good for price. Like having small computer at hand. A must have
Reviews.Title: A must have

Reviews.Author: marian anderson jones
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted and needed. It takes great pictures. I like to watch movies. I can edit my work. I like it a lot.
Reviews.Title: It's great

Reviews.Author: donna englert
Reviews.Content: Lightning fast, great features, BEAUTIFUL picture watching an movies videos. Great sound. All around perfect for everything. LOVE the Amazon Prime with this Kindle.

Reviews.Author: Harleys Lady Forever
Reviews.Content: I put the purchase off for a long time while I thought about what I wanted. I finally decided on Amazon Kindle and got the most recent version. I just love this thing and carry it everywhere I go. It's opened up a whole new world for me in that I can read my book(s) anywhere and not have to lug a suitcase around with me to do it. I love the games too when I need to keep occupied for a length of time OR to keep the grandkids occupied too. I can't live without it now. ;)

Reviews.Author: Robert A Carlson
Reviews.Content: Great product. Kids love it. Fast Delivery. Screen is awesome. Battery life is very good. This is getting used every day.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Ant
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and the recipient loved it.  They couldn't be happier.  It has so many features and is very high resolutions I wish I bought myself one.
Reviews.Title: Awesome gift

Reviews.Author: Catherine Sharpe
Reviews.Content: The vivid color on the Kindle Fire is quite astounding. I can't believe that it is quite light weight and is very easy to handle. It's one of those "take a-longs" wherever there might be a "Wi-Fi" connection. Also, finding apps for the Kindle is very easy to do. Thanks for a great product!
Reviews.Title: HDX Display

Reviews.Author: chase
Reviews.Content: AbSolutely blows the iPad out of the water! The screen is much better, the speed is astounding, and if you have prime you can watch your favorite shOws in high definition! I have the latest generation iPad as well, which I now know was a waste of money.the origami case is great as well, and allows You to use the kindle in numerous stances. do yourself a favor and save some money over the iPad while receiving a superior product.
Reviews.Title: Don't waste money on the ipad!

Reviews.Author: diana gorski
Reviews.Content: How can you go wrong with a kindle,,,,I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter in law,,,bought the IPAD first and after reading the reviews of the kindle, and doing side by side comparisions,,,Well the IPAD went back!!
Reviews.Title: Great kindle

Reviews.Author: jr
Reviews.Content: I had the 7" HD for a year and loved it. Bought this when it offered with a $40.00 discount.  It is light weight but watch out for the case it can get heavy..
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: C. SELF "no more bling/glitzy dolls"
Reviews.Content: The screen clarity and color of the Kindle Fire HDX is the best I have seen.We (I have two Kindle Fire HDX's - one for each of my children) have had people comment on how great the picture, graphics, and speed is.  In fact, one person who had an Ipad said it was better than their Ipad.Very pleased with everything about this product.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is Awesome!

Reviews.Author: becky shenk
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Fire, and loved it too.  But was considering a 10" tablet.  Then the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 got my attention.  The smaller than 10" is not a big deal for me.  I love how it plays videos better than my first Kindle and how the functionality, size (weight, sleekness)  and better sound, are improved.  I take it everywhere with me.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: arnold ferral
Reviews.Content: everything is great about it one thing that does bother me is the ads when are they going to get rid of those sure would like to put my own background on the lock screen
Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Carmela Marino
Reviews.Content: Convenient, lightweight.  Just a little slower than I expected. I would suggest purchasing a separate keyboardThe live help is amazing.
Reviews.Title: Love it.

Reviews.Author: George W Wheatley Jr
Reviews.Content: Very simple to get it up and running. Very impressed with clarity of screen and ease of operation. Received product within 2 days of purchase, just in time to surprise my wife for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. Great product and great service.
Reviews.Title: Love everything about it.

Reviews.Author: Rager "~Rager"
Reviews.Content: If I could give it 4.5 stars I would. Everything is great just wish the battery would last a little longer sometimes, it's not terrible but to last a little longer would be nice.
Reviews.Title: Great when compairing to the original Fire.

Whenever I look for movies to watch but they all seem to cost something and I don't understand apps either. Are they costing me money as well? Also, how can I delete some apps I thought I wanted or needed but really I did not? Not much information was sent along with my Kindle Fire and some things are rather confusing. Thanks, but it is a nice product and I do use it almost daily.

Reviews.Author: Jessica O'Donnell

Reviews.Author: Kathleen

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9 rocks

Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: l have the kindle fire, so I wanted the HDX.I really like it better than my computer & labtop that I also have.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied

Reviews.Author: Thomas Keane
Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX.  I have been looking and comparing similar products for more than a year.  I have an ipad and it  OK for some of the applications that I use.  Kndle leaves the ipad and Nook in the dust when comparing the full pontential of each.  I am very pleaed with my purchase.

Reviews.Author: Arilisa Heredia
Reviews.Content: My only real criticism is it's lack of customization.  I'd like to add my own lock screen wallpaper and control what pops up in the carousel.  Aside from this though, I am in love with my kindle!  I would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves reading!
Reviews.Title: love it!

Reviews.Author: alzera morrison
Reviews.Content: It's the best electronic of its kind.  The mayday feature is awesome!!! To think if I need help I don't ever have to hear again, "due to high call volume your call will be answered in 1 hour."!!!!! Awesome!!!
Reviews.Title: BEATS ANY TABLET OUT THERE

Reviews.Author: Judy Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: I like the larger screen, I can take pictures. The picture is so much clearer. I t is not as heavy as my kindle fire.
Reviews.Title: Enjoy very much

Reviews.Author: Budge
Reviews.Content: After having this tablet for less than a week, both of my kids fight over who gets to use this new Kindle Fire instead of our iPad.  It's really fast and the picture quality is amazing.  And best of all...NO ITUNES!  I was a little concerned before buying this about not having access to Google Apps.  However, most apps were available through the Amazon App store.  Other things, like Google Maps, was available in it's full version using the Silk browser, which is really fast as well.  And if you really need an app you can't find in the Amazon App store, there are simple ways to get your apps from Google without needing to root your device.  Just search online...it's really easy.The only thing this tablet is missing that I can find is the lack of a GPS.  But for $170 less than an iPad, and for a faster processor and better display than almost any other tablet on the market, I can live without a GPS.  For the record, we are streaming videos to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and an iPad at the same time using the Corsair Voyager Air.  It works flawlessly on both devices.
Reviews.Title: We love this tablet!

Reviews.Author: Kelli Bourassa
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my kindle. The display is beautiful, extremely easy to use and the battery life really impresses me. Best birthday gift ever.
Reviews.Title: Love this kindle!

Reviews.Author: Judith C. Dannenberg
Reviews.Content: This purchase is perfect for me since I am NOT a computer whiz and didn't like the other tablet styles nor did I want a laptop computer.  I am still learning all that it has to offer but at my own pace and the "MAYDAY" Technical Support people have been great with my numerous questions.  Love it!!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Barry.S
Reviews.Content: The HDX is faster than the Fire HD and the 8.9 is much easier to read than the 7". I also think the Kindle has more features than an Android tablet; especially for book readers.
Reviews.Title: This is great!

Reviews.Author: sylvester stewart
Reviews.Content: It has excellent resolution the internet is quick the screen is big so it's easy to type it's super light so it makes easy traveling
Reviews.Title: The kindle is great

Reviews.Author: Ladybug T "A Reading Ladybug"
Reviews.Content: For all of those Kindle fans, this is the best piece of electronics I have ever had.  The resolution is great ! the features are easy to achieve, and it is great for reading as well.I would reccomend this to anyone that lokesthe NEW electronics to BUY this ! you won't be sorry.Ladybug 51
Reviews.Title: Kindle FireHDX 8.9

Reviews.Author: Bryan Moorman
Reviews.Content: You have probably looked around at many and heard many arguments for many devices, but you needn't look further. For casual home entertainment and productivity usage this is the tablet.especially if you already have and use Amazon Prime and its various features.It would only get 3 stars for a business application though. No external memory port (shades of Apple).
Reviews.Title: This is the tablet

Reviews.Content: I fell in love with my kindle fire hd 7" 2-years ago.... Everything I need in the palm of my hand that wasn't my phone. This year I decided to upgrade and I'm head over heels..

Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. Could use work on accessing more websites, and handling multiple open tabs. Other than that, it's perfect.
